original: der ni rdzas kyi sgo nas dbye bas dgag ste /
analyzed: der ni rdzas kyi sgo nas dbye bas dgag ste /
translated: But in that case, you are refuting shape on the grounds that it is a substance.

original: 'di dbyibs ma yin no zhes 'di la glan ka med do //
analyzed: 'di dbyibs ma yin no zhes 'di la glan ka med do //
translated: But you cannot argue that it is not shape.

original: 'dus pa'i rdul phra rab la yang dbyibs dgag pa las dbyibs ni rdzas kyi rdul phra rab kyi bdag nyid do zhes bshad pa nyid du 'gyur bas 'di la the tshom med do //
analyzed: 'dus pa'i rdul phra rab la yang dbyibs dgag pa las dbyibs ni rdzas kyi rdul phra rab kyi bdag nyid do zhes bshad pa nyid du 'gyur bas 'di la the tshom med do //
translated: And since you have already refuted shape in subtle particles that compose a composite, you have also refuted shape in the subtle particles that are the essence of substance.

original: de'i phyir mang po de ltar gnas pa dag kho na la ring po la sogs pa 'dogs par zad de bum pa dang snam bu bzhin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir mang po de ltar gnas pa dag kho na la ring po la sogs pa 'dogs par zad de bum pa dang snam bu bzhin no //
translated: Therefore, you are simply imputing length and so on to many things that exist in that way, just as you do with a vase and a cloth.

original: 'on te dbyibs kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: 'on te dbyibs kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: But if you say that shape is imputed to a collection of particles,

original: gang dag bsags pa'i khyad par las ring po la sogs par 'dogs par byed la /
analyzed: gang dag bsags pa'i khyad par las ring po la sogs par 'dogs par byed la /
translated: then you are imputing length and so on to a special collection of particles.

original: dbyibs kyi rdul phra rab de dag kho na de ltar gnas par mig gi rnam par shes pas dmigs par 'dod de /
analyzed: dbyibs kyi rdul phra rab de dag kho na de ltar gnas par mig gi rnam par shes pas dmigs par 'dod de /
translated: They assert that the eye consciousness observes the shape of those very minute particles of color existing in that way.

original: de ni phyogs 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do zhes bya ba ni /üîΩgang kha dog gi rdul phra rab gnyi ga la rab tu grub pa'i rang gi ngo bo ste /
analyzed: de ni phyogs 'dzin pa 'ba' zhig tu zad do zhes bya ba ni / gang kha dog gi rdul phra rab gnyi ga la rab tu grub pa'i rang gi ngo bo ste /
translated: This is mere partiality.üîΩThe cause of the imputation of the shape of length, etc., is the intrinsic reality of the minute particles of color that are established in both.

original: ring po la sogs pa'i dbyibs su 'dogs pa'i rgyu nyid bsal nas dbyibs kyi rdul phra rab rtogs par byed pa'o //
analyzed: ring po la sogs pa'i dbyibs su 'dogs pa'i rgyu nyid bsal nas dbyibs kyi rdul phra rab rtogs par byed pa'o //
translated: Having refuted that, they understand the minute particles of shape.

original: de dag ma grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de nyid la rgyu bshad pa'o //üîΩgal te der sngon po la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab ltar ring po la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab kyang mig gi rnam par shes pas dmigs na /
analyzed: de dag ma grub pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni de nyid la rgyu bshad pa'o // gal te der sngon po la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab ltar ring po la sogs pa'i rdul phra rab kyang mig gi rnam par shes pas dmigs na /
translated: Because they are not established, that is the explanation of the cause of that.üîΩIf the minute particles of shape are observed by the eye consciousness, like the minute particles of blue, etc.,

original: de ltar na de'i cha shas la yang sngon po la sogs pa'i blo bzhi po la sogs pa'i blor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar na de'i cha shas la yang sngon po la sogs pa'i blo bzhi po la sogs pa'i blor 'gyur ro //
translated: then the cognition of the parts of that would be the cognition of length, etc.

original: ring po dang thung ngu gzhan la bltos na de nyid la ring po dang thung ngu'i blor yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: ring po dang thung ngu gzhan la bltos na de nyid la ring po dang thung ngu'i blor yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: If long and short are posited in reliance on another, then the cognition of long and short would not occur in relation to that.

original: 'di ltar sngon po la ni sngon po dang sngon po ma yin @9b par bltos na sngon po dang sngon po ma yin pa'i blor mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sngon po la ni sngon po dang sngon po ma yin @9b par bltos na sngon po dang sngon po ma yin pa'i blor mi 'gyur te /
translated: In that case, blue would not be posited as blue or not blue in reliance on not blue.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: gzhan la mi bltos par rang gi ngo bo kho nas sngon po'i blor 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan la mi bltos par rang gi ngo bo kho nas sngon po'i blor 'gyur ro //
translated: The cognition of blue would occur in reliance on its own entity alone, without relying on another.

original: ci ltar ma nges par 'jug pa'i reg byas ring po la sogs pa nges par dran par 'gyur /
analyzed: ci ltar ma nges par 'jug pa'i reg byas ring po la sogs pa nges par dran par 'gyur /
translated: How could the definite recollection of long and so on occur from contact that engages its object in an indefinite manner?

original: 'on te reg bya dang dbyibs dag la lhan cig spyod pa nges pa med par dbyibs dran par gyur na ni kha dog kyang 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on te reg bya dang dbyibs dag la lhan cig spyod pa nges pa med par dbyibs dran par gyur na ni kha dog kyang 'gyur te /
translated: If the recollection of shape occurs without the definite simultaneous experience of shape and contact, then color would also be remembered.

original: reg bya nges par dran zhes sbyar ro //
analyzed: reg bya nges par dran zhes sbyar ro //
translated: The term ‚Äúdefinite recollection of contact‚Äù is supplied.

original: 'di'i reg bya dran pas kha dog kyang dran no zhes bsams pa'o //
analyzed: 'di'i reg bya dran pas kha dog kyang dran no zhes bsams pa'o //
translated: The idea is that the recollection of contact would also be the recollection of color.

original: yang kha dog nges par mi 'gyur na ni /
analyzed: yang kha dog nges par mi 'gyur na ni /
translated: If color were not definitely recalled,

original: kha dog bzhin du dbyibs kyang ring po la thung ngu'o snyam pa dang / thung ngu la ring po'i snyam du nges par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: kha dog bzhin du dbyibs kyang ring po la thung ngu'o snyam pa dang / thung ngu la ring po'i snyam du nges par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Just as with color, so too with shape: a long shape would not be ascertained as long in relation to a short shape, and a short shape would not be ascertained as short in relation to a long shape.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: kha dog ni nges par dran par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: kha dog ni nges par dran par mi 'gyur te /
translated: Color is not ascertained in memory.

original: res 'ga' reg bya las dmar po la ser po'o snyam du 'gyur la /
analyzed: res 'ga' reg bya las dmar po la ser po'o snyam du 'gyur la /
translated: Sometimes red is remembered as yellow due to tactility.

original: ji ltar kha dog ma nges par dran pa de bzhin du dbyibs kyang ma nges par dran pa ni yin te /
analyzed: ji ltar kha dog ma nges par dran pa de bzhin du dbyibs kyang ma nges par dran pa ni yin te /
translated: Just as color is not ascertained in memory, so too shape is not ascertained in memory.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What is it then?

original: kha dog ma nges par dran par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: kha dog ma nges par dran par mi 'gyur la /
translated: Color is not ascertained in memory,

original: dbyibs ni ji ltar reg bya las nges par dran par 'gyur zhes bya ba mi rigs te /
analyzed: dbyibs ni ji ltar reg bya las nges par dran par 'gyur zhes bya ba mi rigs te /
translated: but shape is ascertained in memory due to tactility.üîΩThat is illogical.

original: reg bya las dran pa ma yin zhes pa'o //
analyzed: reg bya las dran pa ma yin zhes pa'o //
translated: It is not that it is not remembered due to tactility.

original: gang gi phyir ji ltar rdul phra rab rnams 'dus pa kha dog tu gzung ba de ltar so sor ma yin te dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir ji ltar rdul phra rab rnams 'dus pa kha dog tu gzung ba de ltar so sor ma yin te dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because just as the collection of subtle particles is apprehended as color, so too it is not individually, because it is beyond the senses.

original: gnas pa'i rdul phra rab rnams kyang 'dus pa nyid du gzung ngo //
analyzed: gnas pa'i rdul phra rab rnams kyang 'dus pa nyid du gzung ngo //
translated: The atoms of the dimension of the place are also considered as being in a composite.

original: so so ba dbang po las 'das pas na ci ltar de dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyis grub ces slob dpon 'dus bzang zer ro //üîΩgang cung zad thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs 'dus pa dmigs pa nges par rdul phra rab la yod do //
analyzed: so so ba dbang po las 'das pas na ci ltar de dag rang gi mtshan nyid kyis grub ces slob dpon 'dus bzang zer ro // gang cung zad thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs 'dus pa dmigs pa nges par rdul phra rab la yod do //
translated: But, since they are not perceived separately, how can they be established by their own nature?üîΩWhatever is a composite of extended form is perceived in the atom.

original: kha dog dmigs pa la bltos pa med par kha dog bzhin du 'dus pa rnams la dbyibs so //
analyzed: kha dog dmigs pa la bltos pa med par kha dog bzhin du 'dus pa rnams la dbyibs so //
translated: But shape does not exist in composites as color does, without being dependent on something else that is perceived.

original: de'i phyir sa bon gyi chos kyis kyang rdul phra rab tu 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir sa bon gyi chos kyis kyang rdul phra rab tu 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, the atom is also a seed of form.

original: dbyibs kyi rdul phra rab rnams ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dbyibs kyi rdul phra rab rnams ni ma yin te /
translated: But the atom is not a seed of shape.

original: re re pa dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis ma grub par brjod do //
analyzed: re re pa dbang po las 'das pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis ma grub par brjod do //
translated: For, since the individual atoms are not perceived, they are not established by their own nature.

original: 'o na ci ring po la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i yan lag smos she na /
analyzed: 'o na ci ring po la sogs pa'i 'dus pa'i yan lag smos she na /
translated: But if the atoms are not perceived individually, how can the composite be perceived?

original: rdul phra rab las rdul phra rab lus gzhan khyad par med pa'i phyir ring po la sogs pa'i dbyibs kyi rdul phra rab rnams phan tshun gyi @10a * //
analyzed: rdul phra rab las rdul phra rab lus gzhan khyad par med pa'i phyir ring po la sogs pa'i dbyibs kyi rdul phra rab rnams phan tshun gyi @10a * //
translated: because there is no difference between the atoms of shape and the atoms of color, and because the atoms of shape, such as length, etc.,

original: sgo nas khyad par med par thal ba'i phyir dang / ring po la sogs pa'i blo las de ltar gnas pa'i kha dog 'dzin pa bltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis ma grub ces bya'o //
analyzed: sgo nas khyad par med par thal ba'i phyir dang / ring po la sogs pa'i blo las de ltar gnas pa'i kha dog 'dzin pa bltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis ma grub ces bya'o //
translated: are not different from each other. And because the cognition of length, etc., is dependent on the apprehension of color, it is said that they are not established by intrinsic identity.

original: gal te yang gang zhig 'dus dmigs pa'i gzugs de nges par rdul phra rab tu 'gyur dgos na /
analyzed: gal te yang gang zhig 'dus dmigs pa'i gzugs de nges par rdul phra rab tu 'gyur dgos na /
translated: If, however, the form that is the object of the composite sense-spheres must necessarily be an atom,

original: de lta na bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa'i gzugs kyang rdul phra rab tu khas blangs dgos so //
analyzed: de lta na bum pa dang snam bu la sogs pa'i gzugs kyang rdul phra rab tu khas blangs dgos so //
translated: then you must accept that the form of a pot, a cloth, etc., is also an atom.

original: gang bshad pa kha dog la bltos pa med par dbyibs dmigs so zhes bya ba de yang rang gi rnam par rtog pa tsam ste /
analyzed: gang bshad pa kha dog la bltos pa med par dbyibs dmigs so zhes bya ba de yang rang gi rnam par rtog pa tsam ste /
translated: And that explanation that shape is perceived without depending on color is mere speculation,

original: kha cig tu kha dog gi reg bya ma bzung bar dbyibs dmigs pa med do //
analyzed: kha cig tu kha dog gi reg bya ma bzung bar dbyibs dmigs pa med do //
translated: because shape is not perceived without apprehending the tactile sensation of color in some places.

original: 'o na gang kham sa'i snod rnams kha dog kyang tha mi dad la zhe bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: 'o na gang kham sa'i snod rnams kha dog kyang tha mi dad la zhe bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: But if the shape of a clay pot is not different from the color of the clay, how can one apprehend the shape of a pot as different from the color of the clay?

original: gal te 'di kha dog tsam yin gyi /
analyzed: gal te 'di kha dog tsam yin gyi /
translated: If shape is merely color,

original: de la dbyibs su rdzas su med na /
analyzed: de la dbyibs su rdzas su med na /
translated: then shape does not exist as a substance different from color.

original: 'o na ji ltar der bum pa dang phru ba tog dang kham gzhong dang / bcu skyogs la sogs pa rnams dbyibs tha dad par 'dzin ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar der bum pa dang phru ba tog dang kham gzhong dang / bcu skyogs la sogs pa rnams dbyibs tha dad par 'dzin ce na /
translated: But if that is so, how can one apprehend the shape of a pot, a bowl, a cup, a winnowing basket, a dish, a platter, etc. as different?

original: kha dog tsam la ni ring po la sogs pa'i blos 'dzin par mi 'dod kyi /
analyzed: kha dog tsam la ni ring po la sogs pa'i blos 'dzin par mi 'dod kyi /
translated: We do not maintain that one apprehends length, etc. as shape in mere color.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: But if that is so, then what is shape?

original: kha dog gi bye brag la'o //
analyzed: kha dog gi bye brag la'o //
translated: It is a particular arrangement of color.

original: de nyid kyi phyir ji ltar gnas pa'i kha dog la zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir ji ltar gnas pa'i kha dog la zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: That is why the root text says, ‚Äúthe shape of the color that exists in a particular arrangement.üîΩ‚Äù

original: ji skad smos she na /üîΩphyogs gcig gi sgor phal cher zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: ji skad smos she na / phyogs gcig gi sgor phal cher zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa'o //
translated: What does that mean?üîΩIt means that the shape of a pot is the color that exists in a particular arrangement, like a circle, etc.

original: dper na grog ma la sogs pa tha mi dad kyang de'i gnas skabs tha dad pas 'khor lo dang phreng ba la sogs pa tha dad pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na grog ma la sogs pa tha mi dad kyang de'i gnas skabs tha dad pas 'khor lo dang phreng ba la sogs pa tha dad pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, an ant, etc. is not different from the color of its body, but its shape is different from that of its body.

original: gal te kha dog tshogs pa'i khyad par kho na ring po la sogs pa'i blor 'gyur na /
analyzed: gal te kha dog tshogs pa'i khyad par kho na ring po la sogs pa'i blor 'gyur na /
translated: If the idea of long, etc., were due to the particular arrangement of colors,

original: 'o na gang mun khung zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: 'o na gang mun khung zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: then what is the shape of the hole in a pot?

original: tshogs pa can rnams ma bzung bar tshogs pa bzung ba mi rigs so snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: tshogs pa can rnams ma bzung bar tshogs pa bzung ba mi rigs so snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: It is not reasonable to apprehend a collection without apprehending the members of the collection.

original: de dag gis de ni kha dog mi gsal ba kho na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //üîΩgrib ma nag pos bsgrib pa'i phyir mi gsal bar mthong ste /
analyzed: de dag gis de ni kha dog mi gsal ba kho na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo // grib ma nag pos bsgrib pa'i phyir mi gsal bar mthong ste /
translated: They say that the shape of the hole is the shape of the pot, but the shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole.üîΩThe shape of the hole is not the shape of the pot, because the shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole.üîΩThe shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole, because the shape of the hole is not the shape of the pot.

original: phreng ba dang dmag la yongs su rtog pa bzhin no //
analyzed: phreng ba dang dmag la yongs su rtog pa bzhin no //
translated: The shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole, because the shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole.üîΩThe shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole, because the shape of the hole is not the shape of the pot.üîΩThe shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole, because the shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole.üîΩThe shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole, because the shape of the hole is not the shape of the pot.üîΩThe shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole, because the shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole.üîΩThe shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole, because the shape of the hole is not the shape of the pot.üîΩThe shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole, because the shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole.üîΩThe shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole, because the shape of the hole is not the shape of the pot.üîΩThe shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole, because the shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole.üîΩThe shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole, because the shape of the hole is not the shape of the pot.üîΩThe shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole, because the shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole.üîΩThe shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole, because the shape of the hole is not the shape of the pot.

original: dper na mun khung na mtho yor mi gsal bar mthong nas phred du yongs su rtog par byed pa dang / gang du mtho yor dang mi nges par zin par ma gyur pa dang / yang dper na rta dang glang po che la sogs pa @10b dmag gi yan lag mi gsal bar mthong nas dmag tu yongs su rtog pa bzhin te /
analyzed: dper na mun khung na mtho yor mi gsal bar mthong nas phred du yongs su rtog par byed pa dang / gang du mtho yor dang mi nges par zin par ma gyur pa dang / yang dper na rta dang glang po che la sogs pa @10b dmag gi yan lag mi gsal bar mthong nas dmag tu yongs su rtog pa bzhin te /
translated: The shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole, because the shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole.üîΩThe shape of the pot is not the shape of the hole,

original: de dag mi gsal bar mthong ba ni rta la sogs pa'i khyad par mthong ba med pas so //
analyzed: de dag mi gsal bar mthong ba ni rta la sogs pa'i khyad par mthong ba med pas so //
translated: The reason is that the horse, etc. are not seen distinctly.

original: de ni gdon mi za bar de ltar zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: de ni gdon mi za bar de ltar zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: This is so, without a doubt, etc.

original: rgyu 'di'i phyir yang de ltar yin te /
analyzed: rgyu 'di'i phyir yang de ltar yin te /
translated: This is the reason why it is so.

original: gang kha dog nyid mi gsal bar mthong nas dbyibs su yongs su rtog par byed pa'o //
analyzed: gang kha dog nyid mi gsal bar mthong nas dbyibs su yongs su rtog par byed pa'o //
translated: One sees the color indistinctly and then imagines the shape.

original: yongs su chad pa nges par mi zin pa zhes bya ba ni ring po la sogs pa'i dbyibs yongs su chad pa nges par mi zin zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: yongs su chad pa nges par mi zin pa zhes bya ba ni ring po la sogs pa'i dbyibs yongs su chad pa nges par mi zin zhes bya ba'i don gang yin pa'o //
translated: The meaning of the phrase ‚Äúthe distinctness of the shape is not apprehended‚Äù is that the distinctness of the shape, such as long, etc., is not apprehended.

original: kha dog dang dbyibs las tha dad pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched ni yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: kha dog dang dbyibs las tha dad pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched ni yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: A form base that is different from color and shape does not exist,

original: gzugs kyi skye mched kyi rnam pa gnyis te kha dog dang dbyibs so zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs kyi skye mched kyi rnam pa gnyis te kha dog dang dbyibs so zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is said that the form base has two aspects: color and shape.

original: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar de na kha dog gam dbyibs mi gsal bar snang ba yin gyi /
analyzed: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar de na kha dog gam dbyibs mi gsal bar snang ba yin gyi /
translated: Therefore, without a doubt, the color or shape appears indistinctly there.

original: de dag las ma gtogs pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched gsum pa ma yin no zhes khas blang bar bya ba yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: de dag las ma gtogs pa'i gzugs kyi skye mched gsum pa ma yin no zhes khas blang bar bya ba yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: It is not a third type of form that is not included in those two.

original: 'dir yang kha dog las tha dad pa'i dbyibs yod pa ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir yang kha dog las tha dad pa'i dbyibs yod pa ma yin te /
translated: In the same way, shape does not exist separately from color.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: de na kha dog mi gsal ba kho na snang ngo zhes bya bar shes so //üîΩkhyed rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de na kha dog mi gsal ba kho na snang ngo zhes bya bar shes so // khyed rnams kyis zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is understood that only unclear color appears there.üîΩYou

original: khyed cag rnams kyis so //üîΩde dag ni dbyibs kho na la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: khyed cag rnams kyis so // de dag ni dbyibs kho na la zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: You all.üîΩThose shapes

original: 'gro ba dang dbyibs gnyis btags pa yod par khyad par med kyang /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang dbyibs gnyis btags pa yod par khyad par med kyang /
translated: The shape of going and shape are not different in terms of nominal existence.

original: khyab pa ma yin pas 'gro ba bsal nas dbyibs kho na yongs su bzung ste /
analyzed: khyab pa ma yin pas 'gro ba bsal nas dbyibs kho na yongs su bzung ste /
translated: But since shape is not necessarily going, shape alone is taken as the object to be refuted after the refutation of going.

original: 'di ltar thal mo sbyar ba la sogs pa g-yo ba med pas kyang go bar byed la /
analyzed: 'di ltar thal mo sbyar ba la sogs pa g-yo ba med pas kyang go bar byed la /
translated: For example, the shape of folded hands is understood even though they do not move.

original: rang kun nas slong bar byed pa'i sems rig par byed pas kyang rnam par rig byed ces bya na /
analyzed: rang kun nas slong bar byed pa'i sems rig par byed pas kyang rnam par rig byed ces bya na /
translated: Also, shape is called indicative form because it is understood through the mind that motivates it.

original: yul gzhan dag tu ma skyes pa'i thal mo sbyor ba la sogs pa de yang rang kun nas slong ba'i sems rnam par rig par byed pas /
analyzed: yul gzhan dag tu ma skyes pa'i thal mo sbyor ba la sogs pa de yang rang kun nas slong ba'i sems rnam par rig par byed pas /
translated: The gesture of joining the palms in supplication, etc. that is not produced in another place is also known as the mind that motivates it.

original: da'i phyir khyab pas dbyibs kho na gzung gi 'gro ba ni ma yin na /
analyzed: da'i phyir khyab pas dbyibs kho na gzung gi 'gro ba ni ma yin na /
translated: Therefore, it is the shape that is apprehended, not the going, because the shape pervades the gesture.

original: ji ltar bye brag tu smra pa rnams zer ba ltar rdzas su ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar bye brag tu smra pa rnams zer ba ltar rdzas su ni ma yin no //
translated: But it is not substantially real, as the VaibhƒÅ·π£ikas say.

original: ji ltar lus kyi las su 'dogs par byed ces bya ba ni dbyibs btags par yod pa la las nyid mi rung ba'i phyir dang / lus brten pa mi srid pa'i phyir 'dri ba'o //
analyzed: ji ltar lus kyi las su 'dogs par byed ces bya ba ni dbyibs btags par yod pa la las nyid mi rung ba'i phyir dang / lus brten pa mi srid pa'i phyir 'dri ba'o //
translated: How is it designated as bodily action? This question is asked because action is not possible in a shape that exists nominally, and because it is impossible for the body to be a basis.

original: lus la brten pa'i las ni lus kyi las so zhes de @11a * //
analyzed: lus la brten pa'i las ni lus kyi las so zhes de @11a * //
translated: Bodily action is action that is based on the body.

original: ltar 'dogs kyi lus la gnas pa ni ma yin no //üîΩlus la brten pa zhes bya ba ni lus la dmigs pa ste /
analyzed: ltar 'dogs kyi lus la gnas pa ni ma yin no // lus la brten pa zhes bya ba ni lus la dmigs pa ste /
translated: It is designated in that way, but it does not exist in the body.üîΩBeing based on the body means being focused on the body.

original: de yang lus 'jug par byed pa'i sems la mngon par 'dod do //
analyzed: de yang lus 'jug par byed pa'i sems la mngon par 'dod do //
translated: It is asserted that the mind that moves the body is focused on the body.

original: dpyod pa dang bya ba'i sems pa gnyis ka lus la dmigs pa'i phyir na dpyod pa'i sems pa gcad par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: dpyod pa dang bya ba'i sems pa gnyis ka lus la dmigs pa'i phyir na dpyod pa'i sems pa gcad par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: Because both investigation and the intention to act focus on the body, the root text states, ‚Äúthe intention to act that is the instigator of the body in this or that situation.‚Äù

original: de dang der lus 'jug par byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba smos te rab tu 'jug par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de dang der lus 'jug par byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa'o zhes bya ba smos te rab tu 'jug par byed pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The term ‚Äúinstigator‚Äù means ‚Äúthe instigator of engagement.‚Äù

original: de bzhin du ngag dang yid kyi las dag la yang ci rigs par zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de bzhin du ngag dang yid kyi las dag la yang ci rigs par zhes bya ba la /
translated: In a similar way, the root text states, ‚Äúthe intention to act that is the instigator of speech and mind in this or that situation.‚Äù

original: ngag la brten pa'i las ni ngag gi las te /üîΩdag 'jug par byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: ngag la brten pa'i las ni ngag gi las te / dag 'jug par byed pa'i sems pa gang yin pa'o //
translated: Speech is the action that is based on speech.üîΩThe intention to act that is the instigator of speech is the instigator of speech.

original: yid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i las ni yid kyi las so //
analyzed: yid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i las ni yid kyi las so //
translated: The action that is associated with mind is mental action.

original: de ltar na lus dang ngag gi las dag kyang yid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir yid kyi las nyid du thal lo zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na lus dang ngag gi las dag kyang yid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir yid kyi las nyid du thal lo zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then it follows, absurdly, that the actions of body and speech are also mental actions because they are associated with the mind.

original: de ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: That is not so.

original: lus dang ngag gi las gnyis ni yid dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin yang lus dang ngag 'jug par byed pa nyid kyi khyad par du byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus dang ngag gi las gnyis ni yid dang mtshungs par ldan pa yin yang lus dang ngag 'jug par byed pa nyid kyi khyad par du byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Though the two karmas of body and speech are concomitant with the mind, they are distinguished by the specific activity of engaging body and speech.

original: lus dang ngag 'jug par byed pa'i sems ma gtogs pa'i sems pa zag pa dang bcas pa 'am /üîΩzag pa med pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni /
analyzed: lus dang ngag 'jug par byed pa'i sems ma gtogs pa'i sems pa zag pa dang bcas pa 'am / zag pa med pa gang yin pa de thams cad ni /
translated: Except for the mind that engages body and speech, all minds that are concomitant with the mind are mental karmas.üîΩAll minds that are concomitant with the mind are mental karmas.

original: yid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir yid kyi las so zhes bya bar grub po /
analyzed: yid dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i phyir yid kyi las so zhes bya bar grub po /
translated: All minds that are concomitant with the mind are mental karmas.

original: 'o na gang sems pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: 'o na gang sems pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: What is intention?

original: 'dir lus dang ngag gi las ni sems pa kho na la bshad na /
analyzed: 'dir lus dang ngag gi las ni sems pa kho na la bshad na /
translated: If karma of body and speech are explained to be intention alone,

original: de lta yin na bsam pa'i las gang yin pa de med pas /
analyzed: de lta yin na bsam pa'i las gang yin pa de med pas /
translated: then since there would be no karma of intention,

original: sems pa dang bsam pa'i las so zhes 'byung ba'i mdo 'di dang ji ltar mi 'gal zhe na /
analyzed: sems pa dang bsam pa'i las so zhes 'byung ba'i mdo 'di dang ji ltar mi 'gal zhe na /
translated: how could this not contradict the sutra that declares intention and karma of intention?

original: de'i phyir 'di lta bu zhig bya'o snyam zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di lta bu zhig bya'o snyam zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
translated: Therefore it is said:

original: dpyod pa'i sems pa 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig bya'o snyam du sems par bzung nas /
analyzed: dpyod pa'i sems pa 'di dang 'di lta bu zhig bya'o snyam du sems par bzung nas /
translated: The thought I will do this or that investigation is the thought that holds the mind.

original: phyi nas gzhan bya ba'i sems pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: phyi nas gzhan bya ba'i sems pa 'byung ste /
translated: After that, the thought of action arises,

original: bya ba'i tshe rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bya ba'i tshe rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it engages in action.

original: gang gis lus 'jug par byed pa de ni bsam pa'i las zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis lus 'jug par byed pa de ni bsam pa'i las zhes bya ba'o //
translated: That by which the body is engaged is called the action of intention.

original: 'dir 'dus bzang gis sgro btags pa sun 'byin par dgongs nas mang du bshad pa de yang rnam par bshad pa 'di nyid kyis bsams zin te /
analyzed: 'dir 'dus bzang gis sgro btags pa sun 'byin par dgongs nas mang du bshad pa de yang rnam par bshad pa 'di nyid kyis bsams zin te /
translated: Here, intending to refute the superimpositions of Samantabhadra, I have explained this extensively.

original: gzhung mangs pa'i 'jigs @11b pas tshig re re nas bsal ba ma byas so //
analyzed: gzhung mangs pa'i 'jigs @11b pas tshig re re nas bsal ba ma byas so //
translated: But fearing excessive length, I have not clarified each word.

original: 'dod pa na spyod pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs na spyod pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'dod pa na spyod pa zhes bya ba ni gzugs na spyod pa bsal bar bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: The phrase in the desire realm is to exclude the form realm.

original: bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ni so so thar pa'i sdom pa la sogs pa ltar rnam par rig byed la rag las pa ma yin no //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa ni so so thar pa'i sdom pa la sogs pa ltar rnam par rig byed la rag las pa ma yin no //
translated: The absorptions and uncontaminated vows do not depend on indicative form, unlike the pratimoksa vows and so on.

original: nyes pa chen por thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni /
analyzed: nyes pa chen por thal bar 'gyur ro zhes pa ni /
translated: The consequence of a great fault is as follows.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med na ni sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa med pa'i nyes pa dang / lam yan lag brgyad med pa'i nyes pa dang / rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bdun la /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med na ni sdom pa dang sdom pa ma yin pa med pa'i nyes pa dang / lam yan lag brgyad med pa'i nyes pa dang / rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bdun la /
translated: If there is no nonindicative form, there would be the fallacy that there would be no vows and negative commitments, there would be the fallacy that there would be no eightfold noble path and there would be the fallacy that there would be no seven types of merit that arise from material generosity.

original: de la rag las pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'grub pa med pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro //üîΩmdo sde pas gal te lus kyi las zhes bya ba rgyas par smras te /
analyzed: de la rag las pa'i bsod nams mngon par 'grub pa med pa'i nyes par 'gyur ro // mdo sde pas gal te lus kyi las zhes bya ba rgyas par smras te /
translated: If there is no nonindicative form, there would be the fault that there would be no vows and negative commitments, there would be the fault that there would be no eightfold noble path and there would be the fault that the merit of the seven material merits would not be established because it would depend on that.

original: gal te gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed ma yin par 'gyur dogs na snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: gal te gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed ma yin par 'gyur dogs na snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: Sautrantikas say: If you think that there is no doubt that nonindicative form must exist, then what would be the fault?

original: cir 'gyur zhes bya ba ni skyon cir 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: cir 'gyur zhes bya ba ni skyon cir 'gyur zhes bya ba'o //
translated: What would happen? What fault would there be?

original: sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sems tsam la rag las pa'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni sems tsam la rag las pa'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: It would be concomitant with the mind because it would depend on the mind alone, like the nonindicative state of composure.

original: ji ltar bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rnam par rig byed la mi ltos pa'i phyir /
analyzed: ji ltar bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa'i sdom pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rnam par rig byed la mi ltos pa'i phyir /
translated: Just as the uncontaminated vows of absorption are dependent on mind alone, since the uncontaminated vows of absorption are not dependent on indicative form,

original: sems tsam la brten pas sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin pa de bzhin du so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yang rnam par rig byed med pa na sems kyi rjes su 'brang bar thal bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za bar
analyzed: sems tsam la brten pas sems kyi rjes su 'brang ba yin pa de bzhin du so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yang rnam par rig byed med pa na sems kyi rjes su 'brang bar thal bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za bar
translated: so too the uncontaminated vows of individual liberation would be dependent on mind alone, since the uncontaminated vows of individual liberation are not dependent on indicative form.

original: rnam par rig byed khas blang bar bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed khas blang bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, without doubt, one must accept that indicative form exists.

original: de ltar mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni rnam par rig byed kyang sems kyi rjes su 'brang bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
analyzed: de ltar mi 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni rnam par rig byed kyang sems kyi rjes su 'brang bar mi 'gyur ba'o //
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúThat is not so,‚Äù meaning that indicative form does not follow the mind.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sems pa'i khyad par gyis de'i 'phen pa khyad par yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: sems pa'i khyad par gyis de'i 'phen pa khyad par yod pa'i phyir zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
translated: It is said, ‚ÄúBecause the special volition that propels it exists.‚Äù

original: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa la sogs pa dag las ldog par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems pa'i khyad par te /
analyzed: ji srid 'tsho'i bar du srog gcod pa la sogs pa dag las ldog par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni sems pa'i khyad par te /
translated: The special volition that propels it is the thought I will refrain from taking life and so on for as long as I live.

original: de dus nges par 'phangs pa'i dbang gis dus de srid du rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rgyun chags su gnas par mi 'gal lo //
analyzed: de dus nges par 'phangs pa'i dbang gis dus de srid du rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rgyun chags su gnas par mi 'gal lo //
translated: At that time, it is not contradictory that nonindicative form endures for a while due to the power of the projection of intention.

original: sems pa'i khyad par 'di mnyam par gzhag pa ni med de /üîΩdes na 'di ni sems kyi rjes su 'brang @12a * //
analyzed: sems pa'i khyad par 'di mnyam par gzhag pa ni med de / des na 'di ni sems kyi rjes su 'brang @12a * //
translated: This special intention is not equipoise.

original: ba ma yin no //
analyzed: ba ma yin no //
translated: Therefore it is not concomitant with the mind.

original: rnam par rig byed de yod na yang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed de yod na yang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: Even if indicative form exists,

original: rnam par rig byed de yod kyang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa 'phangs pa ste /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed de yod kyang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa 'phangs pa ste /
translated: even if indicative form exists, nonindicative form is projected.

original: 'phangs pa ni dus nges par rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyu'i dngos por gnas pa'o //
analyzed: 'phangs pa ni dus nges par rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyu'i dngos por gnas pa'o //
translated: Projected means that it exists as the cause that definitely engages at a specific time.

original: sems pa'i stobs la rag las pa ni bltos pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: sems pa'i stobs la rag las pa ni bltos pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is said to depend on the power of intention because it is said to rely on intention.

original: 'di nyid la rgyu smras pa ni blun pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste mi gsal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: 'di nyid la rgyu smras pa ni blun pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ste mi gsal ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The reason for this is because it is stupid, that is, because it is unclear.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa de ni sems pa med par 'phen par mi nus la mi gsal ba ni dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa de ni sems pa med par 'phen par mi nus la mi gsal ba ni dmigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That noninformative form cannot be projected without intention, because that which is unclear does not have an object.

original: 'di ltar rnam par rig byed ni sems pa'i dbang gis sdom pa chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu 'phen pa la 'jug gi / lung du ma bstan pas kun nas bslangs pas ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa 'phen par nus par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'di ltar rnam par rig byed ni sems pa'i dbang gis sdom pa chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu 'phen pa la 'jug gi / lung du ma bstan pas kun nas bslangs pas ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa 'phen par nus par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, informative form is engaged in projecting the great, medium, or small vows through the power of intention, but noninformative form cannot be projected through being motivated by that which is neutral.

original: ngag rnam rig byed ni ngag sgra zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ngag rnam rig byed ni ngag sgra zhes bya ba la /
translated: Speech is the informative form of speech.

original: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste mchu 'gul ba la sogs pa'i dbyibs ni ma yin no //
analyzed: ni zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba ste mchu 'gul ba la sogs pa'i dbyibs ni ma yin no //
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù in the root text is for the purpose of exclusion; it excludes shape, such as the movement of the lips, and so on.

original: de nyid kyi phyir dag gi rang bzhin gyi sgra gang yin pa zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir dag gi rang bzhin gyi sgra gang yin pa zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
translated: Therefore, it says, ‚ÄúIt is the sound that is the nature of speech.‚Äù

original: gal te ngag kho na rnam par rig byed yin na /
analyzed: gal te ngag kho na rnam par rig byed yin na /
translated: If speech is only informative form,

original: 'o na ji ltar ngag rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes brjod ce na /
analyzed: 'o na ji ltar ngag rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes brjod ce na /
translated: why is it called noninformative form?

original: lus kyis rnam par rig par byed pa dang yid kyis las byed pa med par lus nyid kyis rnam par rig byed dang yid nyid kyis kyang las kyi bdag nyid do zhes mi gzung ngo //
analyzed: lus kyis rnam par rig par byed pa dang yid kyis las byed pa med par lus nyid kyis rnam par rig byed dang yid nyid kyis kyang las kyi bdag nyid do zhes mi gzung ngo //
translated: But you should not hold that the body itself is informative form and the mind itself is action, without the body being aware and the mind acting.

original: 'di ni de ltar yod do /
analyzed: 'di ni de ltar yod do /
translated: This is how it exists.

original: 'on kyang ji ltar lus dang yid las tha dad pa'i rnam par rig byed kyi las kyang mi gzung ngo //
analyzed: 'on kyang ji ltar lus dang yid las tha dad pa'i rnam par rig byed kyi las kyang mi gzung ngo //
translated: But you should not hold that informative form is different from the body and mind.

original: des na rnam par rig byed kyi las der bzung bas 'gal ba med do //
analyzed: des na rnam par rig byed kyi las der bzung bas 'gal ba med do //
translated: Therefore there is no contradiction in holding that informative form is action.

original: 'dir ni ngag las tha dad pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gzhan med de /
analyzed: 'dir ni ngag las tha dad pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gzhan med de /
translated: Here there is no noninformative form that is different from speech.

original: de'i phyir rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya ba ste 'di la skyon med do //
analyzed: de'i phyir rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zhes bya ba ste 'di la skyon med do //
translated: Therefore there is no fault in saying that informative form and noninformative form are action.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni sngar bshad pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni sngar bshad pa kho na yin no zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Noninformative form was previously explained as follows:

original: g-yengs dang sems med pa'i yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdzod kyi gnas dang po nas so //
analyzed: g-yengs dang sems med pa'i yang zhes bya ba la sogs pa mdzod kyi gnas dang po nas so //
translated: ‚ÄúOf the distracted and those without mind‚Äù and so on in the first chapter of the Abhidharmako≈õa.

original: khas blangs nas mi byed pa tsam gyi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di bdag gis @12b mi bya'o zhes sngar khas blangs nas phyis de mi byed pa tsam gyi phyir zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: khas blangs nas mi byed pa tsam gyi phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni 'di bdag gis @12b mi bya'o zhes sngar khas blangs nas phyis de mi byed pa tsam gyi phyir zhes bya ba ste /
translated: One merely does not do what one has previously promised not to do, saying, ‚ÄúI will not do this.‚Äù

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rig byed med pa yin pas rdzas su khas blang bar mi bya'o //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rig byed med pa yin pas rdzas su khas blang bar mi bya'o //
translated: Nonindicative form is not a substance, because it does not indicate.

original: 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The past great elementsüîΩare the source of nonindicative form belonging to the desire realm.

original: 'dod gtogs rnam rig min skad cig / phyin chad 'das pa'i 'byung las skye //üîΩzhes 'byung ba'i phyir la /
analyzed: 'dod gtogs rnam rig min skad cig / phyin chad 'das pa'i 'byung las skye // zhes 'byung ba'i phyir la /
translated: The Abhidharmakosa states, Nonindicative form belonging to the desire realm arises from past elements.

original: de rnams kyang yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: de rnams kyang yod pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin yin pa'i phyir te /
translated: And they do not exist because they are essentially nonexistent.

original: 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po de rnams ni da ltar byung ba rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po de rnams ni da ltar byung ba rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Those past great elements do not exist because they are essentially nonexistent in the present.

original: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni yod pa ma yin pa'i rten can yod pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni yod pa ma yin pa'i rten can yod pa yang ma yin no //
translated: Compounded form that is not a source element does not exist and it does not exist as a basis.

original: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: gzugs kyi mtshan nyid med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: Because form does not have the characteristic of form.

original: gzugs su yod cing gzugs su rung ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par gyur pa bstan pa'i sgo nas gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du gsungs na /
analyzed: gzugs su yod cing gzugs su rung ba zhes bya ba ni rnam par gyur pa bstan pa'i sgo nas gzugs kyi mtshan nyid du gsungs na /
translated: The characteristic of form is said to be that which exists as form and is suitable as form, in terms of demonstrating transformation.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs ni rnam par 'gyur ba yang ma yin pa de ni med pa nyid do //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs ni rnam par 'gyur ba yang ma yin pa de ni med pa nyid do //
translated: Nonindicative form does not transform. Therefore, it does not exist.

original: rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
analyzed: rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang // zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ngo //
translated: The three types of stainless form and so on are stated.

original: bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
analyzed: bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re /
translated: Vaibhasikas say:üîΩThe three types of stainless form and so on

original: rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang // 'phel dang ma byas lam sogs phyir //
analyzed: rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang // 'phel dang ma byas lam sogs phyir //
translated: are stated because they increase, are not created, are paths and so on.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rdzas su yod do zhes zer te /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rdzas su yod do zhes zer te /
translated: Nonindicative form exists as a substance.

original: rnam pa gsum dang dri ma med pa'i gzugs ni rnam gsum dri med gzugs so //
analyzed: rnam pa gsum dang dri ma med pa'i gzugs ni rnam gsum dri med gzugs so //
translated: The three types of stainless form are the three types of stainless form.

original: de bshad pa ni rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs so //
analyzed: de bshad pa ni rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs so //
translated: The explanation of that is the three types of stainless form and so on are stated.

original: 'phel ba dang ma byas pa'i lam la sogs pa ni 'phel dang ma byas lam sogs so //
analyzed: 'phel ba dang ma byas pa'i lam la sogs pa ni 'phel dang ma byas lam sogs so //
translated: The path of increase and the path of non-practice, etc. are the path of increase and the path of non-practice, etc.

original: rnam pa gsum dang dri ma med gzugs gsungs pa dang / 'phel ba dang ma byas pa'i lam la sogs pa ni /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum dang dri ma med gzugs gsungs pa dang / 'phel ba dang ma byas pa'i lam la sogs pa ni /
translated: The three kinds and the stainless form are mentioned, and the path of increase and the path of non-practice, etc.üîΩare mentioned.

original: rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang // 'phel dang ma byas lam sogs te //
analyzed: rnam gsum dri med gzugs gsungs dang // 'phel dang ma byas lam sogs te //
translated: The three kinds, the stainless form, and the path of increase and the path of non-practice, etc.

original: de dag gi phyir ro //üîΩgzugs kyis gzugs bsdus pa zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: de dag gi phyir ro // gzugs kyis gzugs bsdus pa zhes bya ba la /
translated: are mentioned.üîΩThe form aggregate is mentioned.

original: gzugs gnyis pa smos pa ni gzugs kho nas gzugs bsdus pa yin gyi /
analyzed: gzugs gnyis pa smos pa ni gzugs kho nas gzugs bsdus pa yin gyi /
translated: The second mention of form is to make it understood that the form aggregate is included by form alone,

original: tshor ba la sogs pa gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no zhes ci nas nges par gzung ba shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tshor ba la sogs pa gzhan dag gis ni ma yin no zhes ci nas nges par gzung ba shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: and not by other things such as feeling, etc.

original: bstan du yod la thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs kyang yod ces bya ba ni /üîΩskye mched @13a * //
analyzed: bstan du yod la thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs kyang yod ces bya ba ni / skye mched @13a * //
translated: There is also form that is demonstrable and resistant.

original: kyi gzugs mig gi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'o //
analyzed: kyi gzugs mig gi rnam par shes pas shes par bya ba'o //
translated: The form of the sense bases is to be known by eye consciousness.

original: bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs kyang yod ces bya ba ni gzugs kyi skye mched kyi bye brag rnams so //
analyzed: bstan du med la thogs pa dang bcas pa'i gzugs kyang yod ces bya ba ni gzugs kyi skye mched kyi bye brag rnams so //
translated: There is form that is not susceptible to being indicated but does possess resistance. This refers to the various forms that constitute the sense base of form.

original: bstan du yang med la thogs pa yang med pa'i gzugs kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bstan du yang med la thogs pa yang med pa'i gzugs kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni /
translated: There is form that is not susceptible to being indicated and does not possess resistance.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs chos kyi skye mched kyis bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i gzugs chos kyi skye mched kyis bsdus pa'o //
translated: This refers to the form that is not susceptible to being indicated and is included in the sense base of the entity.

original: zag pa med pa yang med do zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: zag pa med pa yang med do zhes bya ba la /
translated: There is no form that is pure.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs par gzugs gzhan ni zag pa med par mi rigs te /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs par gzugs gzhan ni zag pa med par mi rigs te /
translated: It is not reasonable to maintain that any form other than the form that is not susceptible to being indicated is pure.

original: lam la snyoms par zhugs pa la lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs ni med la /
analyzed: lam la snyoms par zhugs pa la lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed kyi gzugs ni med la /
translated: The form that is susceptible to being indicated, which is comprised of the body and speech, does not exist for one who has entered the path of meditative equipoise.

original: gang mig la sogs pa'i gzugs ni yod mod kyi /
analyzed: gang mig la sogs pa'i gzugs ni yod mod kyi /
translated: The form that is comprised of the eye, etc., does exist.

original: de yang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ma yin pa'i phyir zag pa med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de yang ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa ma yin pa'i phyir zag pa med pa ma yin no //
translated: However, since that form is not unobscured and indeterminate, it is not pure.

original: rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po 'di dag zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun po 'di dag zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: These are the seven types of meritorious works that are material.

original: 'di la rdzas ni kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i dngos po'o //
analyzed: 'di la rdzas ni kun dga' ra ba dang / gtsug lag khang la sogs pa'i dngos po'o //
translated: Here, material refers to the things such as monasteries and temples.

original: rgyu mtshan gyis bdun par byas nas /
analyzed: rgyu mtshan gyis bdun par byas nas /
translated: The seven are enumerated on the basis of the material.

original: de las byung ba ni rdzas las byung ba ste /
analyzed: de las byung ba ni rdzas las byung ba ste /
translated: The works that arise from the material are the meritorious works that are material.

original: dper na glo bur du 'ongs pa la sbyin pa dang / 'gron po la sbyin pa dang / nad pa la sbyin pa dang / nad pa'i rim gro pa la sbyin pa dang / kun dga' ra ba la 'bul ba dang / gcig tu slong ba la shom pa dang /
analyzed: dper na glo bur du 'ongs pa la sbyin pa dang / 'gron po la sbyin pa dang / nad pa la sbyin pa dang / nad pa'i rim gro pa la sbyin pa dang / kun dga' ra ba la 'bul ba dang / gcig tu slong ba la shom pa dang /
translated: For example, giving to guests, giving to travelers, giving to the sick, giving to those who are nursing the sick, giving to the monastery, giving to those who are constantly begging,

original: char pa dang rlung mo che la sogs pa dag byung na zan dang skyom la sogs pa sbyin pa ste /
analyzed: char pa dang rlung mo che la sogs pa dag byung na zan dang skyom la sogs pa sbyin pa ste /
translated: and giving food and drink, etc. when there is a storm, etc.

original: 'di ni rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun no //
analyzed: 'di ni rdzas las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po bdun no //
translated: These are the seven meritorious works that are material.

original: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du'o //
analyzed: rtag tu zhes bya ba ni yang dang yang du'o //
translated: Constantly means again and again.

original: rgyun mi 'chad par zhes bya ba ni bar med pa'o //
analyzed: rgyun mi 'chad par zhes bya ba ni bar med pa'o //
translated: Without interruption means without a break.

original: rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa dag dang ldan pa yang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa dag dang ldan pa yang de dang 'dra'o zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The same is true of those who possess the virtues that are not derived from substance.

original: ji ltar rdzas las byung ba dag dang ldan pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'phel ba kho nar 'gyur ba bzhin du rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa dang ldan pa yin no //
analyzed: ji ltar rdzas las byung ba dag dang ldan pa rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par bsod nams 'phel ba kho nar 'gyur ba bzhin du rdzas las byung ba ma yin pa dang ldan pa yin no //
translated: Just as those who possess the virtues that are derived from substance always and continuously increase in merit, so also do those who possess the virtues that are not derived from substance.

original: yang de dag ni dad pa dang ldan pa dag ste /
analyzed: yang de dag ni dad pa dang ldan pa dag ste /
translated: Moreover, those who possess the virtues that are not derived from substance are faithful.

original: dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'am /
analyzed: dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'am /
translated: For example, it is like the following passage from a sutra:üîΩ‚ÄúWhen they hear that a Tathagata or a disciple of the Tathagata is staying in a village or a town, and having heard this, they obtain a joyful and supremely joyful mind.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos grong ngam grong gi nye 'khor zhig na bzhugs so zhes thos @13b shing thos nas kyang sems dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba thob ste zhes 'byung ba'i phyir mdo ji lta ba bzhin no //
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos grong ngam grong gi nye 'khor zhig na bzhugs so zhes thos @13b shing thos nas kyang sems dga' ba dang rab tu dga' ba thob ste zhes 'byung ba'i phyir mdo ji lta ba bzhin no //
translated: Those who possess the virtues that are not derived from substance are faithful in this way, just as it is stated in the sutra.

original: yid gzhan dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
analyzed: yid gzhan dang ldan pa'i zhes bya ba ni nyon mongs pa can dang lung du ma bstan pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o //
translated: Those who possess the virtues that are not derived from substance have a mind that is different from the mind of those who possess the virtues that are derived from substance.

original: de'i tshe rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs par bsod nams rnam par 'phel bar mi rung ste /
analyzed: de'i tshe rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs par bsod nams rnam par 'phel bar mi rung ste /
translated: At that time, it is not possible for merit to increase except through nonindicative form,

original: sems gzhan dang ldan pa la lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed rjes su 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems gzhan dang ldan pa la lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed rjes su 'brel ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because one who possesses another mind does not have the physical and verbal indicative forms that are related to it.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rjes su 'brel pa yod de /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rjes su 'brel pa yod de /
translated: Nonindicative form is related to it,

original: g-yengs dang sems med pa yi yang //
analyzed: g-yengs dang sems med pa yi yang //
translated: because it is said, ‚ÄúEven for those with distracted minds or no minds,

original: dge dang mi dge'i rjes 'brel gang //üîΩzhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
analyzed: dge dang mi dge'i rjes 'brel gang // zhes bya ba'i mtshan nyid kyis so //
translated: there is a relation to virtue and nonvirtue.‚Äù

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med na zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med na zhes bya ba 'byung ste /
translated: The term ‚Äúexcept for nonindicative form‚Äù is supplied.

original: gang zhig dngos gzhi'i las kyi lam nyid du rnam par gzhag la /
analyzed: gang zhig dngos gzhi'i las kyi lam nyid du rnam par gzhag la /
translated: What is posited as the actual basis of the karmic path?

original: bya ba ma rdzogs pa'i tshe na ni gzhan byed du 'jug pa'i bsgo ba po la lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed yod pa ma yin zhing rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yang med do //
analyzed: bya ba ma rdzogs pa'i tshe na ni gzhan byed du 'jug pa'i bsgo ba po la lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed yod pa ma yin zhing rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yang med do //
translated: When the action is not complete, the one who commands does not have the indicative form of body and speech, nor does he have nonindicative form.

original: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed ma yin pa khas blang bar bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed ma yin pa khas blang bar bya ste /
translated: Therefore, nonindicative form must definitely be accepted.

original: de lta ma yin te rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med na ni las kyi lam mi 'grub par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin te rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med na ni las kyi lam mi 'grub par 'gyur ro //
translated: If nonindicative form did not exist, then the karmic path would not be established.

original: yang lung bsgo nas las kyi lam yin par 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: yang lung bsgo nas las kyi lam yin par 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If you think that the karmic path would be established through the mere proclamation of a command,

original: de'i phyir lung bsgo ba tsam ni zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir lung bsgo ba tsam ni zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
translated: then to respond to that, the text says, The mere proclamation of a command is not a karmic path.

original: de nyid la rgyu smos pa ni las de ma byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de nyid la rgyu smos pa ni las de ma byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'o //
translated: The reason for that is because that action is not committed.

original: lung bsgo ba'i tshe srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i las de la byas pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: lung bsgo ba'i tshe srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i las de la byas pa'i phyir te /
translated: At the time of the proclamation of a command, the action of taking life and so on is not committed.

original: las ma byas par ni dngos gzhi'i las kyi lam rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: las ma byas par ni dngos gzhi'i las kyi lam rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: It is illogical that the karmic path of the actual basis is committed without the action being committed.

original: las byas pa ni las kyi lam du 'gyur ro snyam pa'i dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir /
analyzed: las byas pa ni las kyi lam du 'gyur ro snyam pa'i dogs pa bsal ba'i phyir /
translated: To dispel the doubt that the action committed is the karmic path,

original: byas su zin kyang de'i rang gi ngo bo la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes smos te /
analyzed: byas su zin kyang de'i rang gi ngo bo la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhes smos te /
translated: the text says, Even if it is committed, there is no difference in its nature.

original: las byas sam ma byas kyang rung ste /
analyzed: las byas sam ma byas kyang rung ste /
translated: Whether the action is committed or not,

original: lung bsgo pa la ni bdag nyid kyi khyad par med na /
analyzed: lung bsgo pa la ni bdag nyid kyi khyad par med na /
translated: If there is no difference between the former and latter self,

original: snga ma dang phyi ma khyad par ma skyes pa de ni ji ltar phyis las kyi lam du 'gyur /
analyzed: snga ma dang phyi ma khyad par ma skyes pa de ni ji ltar phyis las kyi lam du 'gyur /
translated: then how could the latter be a karmic path?

original: skye mched bcu gcig gis ma bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi skye mched ma gtogs pa lhag ma bcu gcig go //üîΩyid kyi skye mched ltar gzugs can @14a * //
analyzed: skye mched bcu gcig gis ma bsdus pa zhes bya ba ni chos kyi skye mched ma gtogs pa lhag ma bcu gcig go // yid kyi skye mched ltar gzugs can @14a * //
translated: The phrase ‚Äúnot subsumed by the eleven bases‚Äù means not subsumed by the eleven bases other than the phenomena base.

original: ma yin pa'o zhes ni ma gsungs so //
analyzed: ma yin pa'o zhes ni ma gsungs so //
translated: It is not said to be nonphysical like the mental base.

original: dgos pa ci zhig yod par 'gyur zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: dgos pa ci zhig yod par 'gyur zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
translated: What would be the purpose?

original: snyoms par zhugs pa la lus dang ngag gi las kyi mtha' rnams mi rung phyir te /
analyzed: snyoms par zhugs pa la lus dang ngag gi las kyi mtha' rnams mi rung phyir te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbecause the culmination of physical and verbal karma is impossible‚Äù means that the culmination of physical and verbal karma is impossible for one who has entered meditative attainment.

original: lam la snyoms par zhugs pa ni tshig tu mi smra zhing lus mi g-yo la chos gos la sogs pa tshol ba yang ma yin no //
analyzed: lam la snyoms par zhugs pa ni tshig tu mi smra zhing lus mi g-yo la chos gos la sogs pa tshol ba yang ma yin no //
translated: One who has entered the path of meditative attainment does not speak, does not move the body, and does not seek Dharma robes and so on.

original: mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: mi rung ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: Because it is impossible means because it is impossible.

original: mi srid pa ni de dag kun nas slong ba'i sems rnams kha phyir bltas te 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi srid pa ni de dag kun nas slong ba'i sems rnams kha phyir bltas te 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the minds that motivate them are directed outward.

original: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed ma yin pa khas blang par bya ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir gdon mi za bar rnam par rig byed ma yin pa khas blang par bya ste /
translated: Therefore, one must definitely accept that there is nonindicative form.

original: de med na ni lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'gal ba yin no //
analyzed: de med na ni lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya ba 'gal ba yin no //
translated: If it did not exist, it would contradict the statement that there is an eightfold path.

original: 'o na 'di skad du zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: 'o na 'di skad du zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
translated: If, as you maintain,üîΩthe path of seeing existsüîΩand there is no nonindicative form,üîΩwhy did the BhagavƒÅn say,üîΩ‚ÄúIf, when one enters the path, one possesses right speech and so on, like right view and so forth, why did he say,

original: 'di ni gal te lam la snyoms par zhugs pa la yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa bzhin du yang dag pa'i ngag la sogs pa yod na ni 'di'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rnams ni sngon zhes bya ba de skad du ci'i phyir
analyzed: 'di ni gal te lam la snyoms par zhugs pa la yang dag pa'i lta ba la sogs pa bzhin du yang dag pa'i ngag la sogs pa yod na ni 'di'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba rnams ni sngon zhes bya ba de skad du ci'i phyir
translated: ‚ÄòHis speech, actions and livelihood are previously purified‚Äô?

original: gsungs zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: gsungs zhes bya ba ni brjod par bya ste /
translated: This must be explained.

original: des na de'i tshe yang dag pa'i ngag la sogs pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar shes so //
analyzed: des na de'i tshe yang dag pa'i ngag la sogs pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yod pa ma yin no zhes bya bar shes so //
translated: Therefore, at that time, right speech and so on do not exist as nonindicative form.

original: des na sdom pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i lus dang ngag gi las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa dang yongs su byang ba na lam la snyoms par zhugs par yongs su drang ngo zhes bya ste /
analyzed: des na sdom pa'i nang du 'dus pa'i lus dang ngag gi las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho ba yongs su dag pa dang yongs su byang ba na lam la snyoms par zhugs par yongs su drang ngo zhes bya ste /
translated: Therefore, when the physical and verbal actions and livelihood included in the vows are completely pure and completely cleansed, it is said that one enters meditative attainment in the path.

original: de'i phyir lam yan lag brgyad grub pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir lam yan lag brgyad grub pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med do zhe na /
translated: Therefore, since one accomplishes the eightfold noble path, there is no nonindicative form.üîΩThis is extensively stated in the Abhidharmako≈õa:

original: de ni sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral bar byas pa la zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
analyzed: de ni sngon 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral bar byas pa la zhes bya ba rgyas par smos te /
translated: It is said that those previously freed from attachmentüîΩare completely pure and completely cleansed.

original: sngar 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral bar byas pa gang yin pa de la dgongs te /
analyzed: sngar 'jig rten pa'i lam gyis 'dod chags dang bral bar byas pa gang yin pa de la dgongs te /
translated: This is stated with the intention of those previously freed from attachment by the mundane path.

original: sngar 'jig rten pas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gnas skabs kho nar de dag yongs su dag cing yongs su byang ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di gsungs pas /
analyzed: sngar 'jig rten pas 'dod chags dang bral ba'i gnas skabs kho nar de dag yongs su dag cing yongs su byang ba yin no zhes bya ba 'di gsungs pas /
translated: This is stated in the context of those previously freed from attachment by the mundane path, who are completely pure and completely cleansed.

original: de'i phyir lam la snyoms par zhugs pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yod pa nyid do //
analyzed: de'i phyir lam la snyoms par zhugs pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa yod pa nyid do //
translated: Therefore nonindicative form exists for one who enters meditative attainment in the path.

original: yang dag par blangs pa'i 'og tu zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: yang dag par blangs pa'i 'og tu zhes bya ba la /
translated: After the proper undertaking.

original: yang dag par len pa'i tshe ni rnam par rig byed dang de'i sems pa @14b yon pas yang dag par blangs pa'i 'og tu zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: yang dag par len pa'i tshe ni rnam par rig byed dang de'i sems pa @14b yon pas yang dag par blangs pa'i 'og tu zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: At the time of the proper undertaking, there is no informative action or intention that is crooked, so he says, ‚Äúafter the proper undertaking.‚ÄùüîΩThere is none that is subsequent.

original: de ni med do zhes bya ba ni gang zhig rjes su 'jug pas yid gzhan dang ldan pa 'di yang dge slong mar 'gyur ba'i rnam par rig byed dam sems pa'am de las gzhan med do //üîΩgzhung mang ba'i phyir 'di ni mang po yin la /
analyzed: de ni med do zhes bya ba ni gang zhig rjes su 'jug pas yid gzhan dang ldan pa 'di yang dge slong mar 'gyur ba'i rnam par rig byed dam sems pa'am de las gzhan med do // gzhung mang ba'i phyir 'di ni mang po yin la /
translated: There is no informative action or intention that is subsequent to the proper undertaking and that is possessed by one who has a different mental continuum and who becomes a bhik·π£u·πáƒ´.üîΩThis is a great deal of text, and it is a great deal of fault that you would incur if you did not accept the existence of noninformative form.üîΩIt is a great deal of text because it is a great deal of scripture.

original: las kyi lam nyid ji lta ba bzhin du lus kyi dang ngag gi nyid kyang btags pa kho na las yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: las kyi lam nyid ji lta ba bzhin du lus kyi dang ngag gi nyid kyang btags pa kho na las yin no zhes ston to //

original: dper na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa @16b rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa smra ba rnams kyis kyang 'bras bu la rgyu btags pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa las kyi lam du 'dod la /
analyzed: dper na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa @16b rnams kyi zhes bya ba ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa smra ba rnams kyis kyang 'bras bu la rgyu btags pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa las kyi lam du 'dod la /
translated: For example, the Vaibhasikas say that nonindicative form is the karmic path, since they impute the cause to the result.

analyzed: lus dang ngag gi bya ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir lus kyi'am ngag gi nyid du 'dod pa yin no //

original: zin pa'i phung po dag la zhes bya ba da ltar ba dag la ste /
analyzed: zin pa'i phung po dag la zhes bya ba da ltar ba dag la ste /
translated: The Abhidharmakosa states, They are the appropriated aggregates.

original: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni zin pa'i ma yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa ni zin pa'i ma yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //

original: de lta mod kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i gnas kyi dngos po nye bar bzung nas gzugs kyi phung po gcig pu nyid zin pa de ltar sems dang sems las byung ba'i gnas kyi dngos po nye bar bzung ba'o //
analyzed: de lta mod kyi sems dang sems las byung ba'i gnas kyi dngos po nye bar bzung nas gzugs kyi phung po gcig pu nyid zin pa de ltar sems dang sems las byung ba'i gnas kyi dngos po nye bar bzung ba'o //
translated: However, the form aggregate alone is appropriated because it is the basis of mind and mental factors.

original: gzugs kyi phung po'i dbang gis tshor ba la sogs pa rnams zin pa la sogs par bstan te rang gi ngo bos de ltar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs kyi phung po'i dbang gis tshor ba la sogs pa rnams zin pa la sogs par bstan te rang gi ngo bos de ltar dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Feeling and so on are included by the power of the form aggregate, because they are observed in that way by intrinsic nature.

original: ji skad du mdo las /
analyzed: ji skad du mdo las /
translated: As a s≈´tra declares:

original: zin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lus kyi tshig bla dags so zhes 'byung ngo //
analyzed: zin pa zhes bya ba 'di ni lus kyi tshig bla dags so zhes 'byung ngo //

analyzed: yang na zin pa'i phung po du ma 'chad par 'dod pas phung po rnams la zhes mang po'i tshig gis gsungs so //

original: de lta ma yin na khams rnams zin pa ma yin pas bstan bcos dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta ma yin na khams rnams zin pa ma yin pas bstan bcos dang 'gal bar 'gyur ro //

original: 'dir btsun pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa khas blangs dang sems pa kho na las kyi lam yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir btsun pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa khas blangs dang sems pa kho na las kyi lam yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: Here the Venerable would teach that the path of action is nonindicative form and volition alone.

original: btsun pa'i bsam pa yang dag pa yin nam ma yin snyam ste 'di la bsam pa ni bdag nyid kyis gsod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
analyzed: btsun pa'i bsam pa yang dag pa yin nam ma yin snyam ste 'di la bsam pa ni bdag nyid kyis gsod pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa smos so //
translated: But is the Venerable‚Äôs intention correct or not?

original: nye bar bstan pa 'di ni las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par lhur byed pa ma yin gyi ;
analyzed: nye bar bstan pa 'di ni las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs par lhur byed pa ma yin gyi ;
translated: This teaching does not emphasize the completion of the karmic path.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What does it emphasize?

original: rang nyid kyis gsod pa la sems pa 'byung ba lhur byed pa yin no //
analyzed: rang nyid kyis gsod pa la sems pa 'byung ba lhur byed pa yin no //
translated: It emphasizes the occurrence of the intention to kill oneself.

original: de kho na dang 'dra bar mi mngon par zhes bya ba ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ltar tshad dag gis mi dmigs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: de kho na dang 'dra bar mi mngon par zhes bya ba ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ltar tshad dag gis mi dmigs zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: ‚ÄúJust like that‚Äù means that it is not perceived by the sense faculties, as if it were non-informative form.

analyzed: sems kyi rgyu las byung ba ni sems sngon du 'gro ba dang sems kyi rgyu can zhes bya ba'i don to //

analyzed: lus kyi sbyor ba zhes bya ba ni lus kyi bya ba ste /
translated: ‚ÄúBodily application‚Äù means bodily action.

original: lus kyi g-yo ba'o //
analyzed: lus kyi g-yo ba'o //

original: bya ba yongs su rdzogs na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: bya ba yongs su rdzogs na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúWhen the action is completed‚Äù means

original: las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs na zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //

analyzed: de dag dang zhes bya ba ni lus dang sems dang ste /
translated: ‚ÄúThose‚Äù refers to the body, mind, and action.

original: @17a * // chos gzhan ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid can no //üîΩgang gis byas pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ste /
analyzed: @17a * // chos gzhan ni rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid can no // gang gis byas pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba ste /
translated: Another phenomenon is characterized as non-informative.

original: sems gang gis byas pa ni gang gis byas pa'i sbyor ba'o //
analyzed: sems gang gis byas pa ni gang gis byas pa'i sbyor ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúThat which is produced by the activity of a certain mind‚Äù means that which is produced by the activity of a certain mind.üîΩThe activity of a certain mind is the activity of a certain mind.

original: de las byung ba'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa ni las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o //
analyzed: de las byung ba'i bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa ni las kyi lam yongs su rdzogs pa'o //

analyzed: de kho na la zhes bya ba ni sbyor bar byed pa po'i sems la'o //

original: de'i rgyu can gyis zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu can no //
analyzed: de'i rgyu can gyis zhes bya ba ni yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu can no //
translated: ‚ÄúHaving that as its cause‚Äù means having the completion as its cause.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

analyzed: bya ba yongs su rdzogs pa ni des byas pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba'i phyir ro //

analyzed: yongs su dga' bar 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúOne becomes pleased‚Äù means

analyzed: rgyun yongs su 'gyur ba'i khyad par sems kyi bdag nyid du gyur pa'i chos yin pa'i phyir ro //
