original: sems dang sems las byung ba'i rgyud las zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste /
analyzed: sems dang sems las byung ba'i rgyud las zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'byung ste /
translated: ‚ÄúIt arises from the mindstream of mind and mental factors.‚Äù

original: 'di ga las rtogs she na /
analyzed: 'di ga las rtogs she na /
translated: Where is this taught?üîΩThe sutra states:üîΩ‚ÄúIf the mind is intoxicated, then one is reborn in a higher realm through the power of faith and ethics.‚Äù

original: sems myos pa'am zhes bya ba nas dad pa dang tshul khrims kyis yongs su bsgos pa gong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi mdo las so //
analyzed: sems myos pa'am zhes bya ba nas dad pa dang tshul khrims kyis yongs su bsgos pa gong du 'gro bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar gyi mdo las so //
translated: The sutra states:üîΩ‚ÄúBecause there is no nonindicative form.‚Äù

original: rnam par rig byed med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni 'dod pa'i khams na rnam par rig byed med pa med la rnam par rig byed kyang rdzas su yod pa ma yin no zhesüîΩrgyas par bstan zin to //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de lta bu la sogs pa la rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni 'dod pa'i khams na rnam par rig byed med pa med la rnam par rig byed kyang rdzas su yod pa ma yin no zhes rgyas par bstan zin to //
translated: It has been extensively explained that nonindicative form does not exist in the desire realm and indicative form does not substantially exist.

original: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni khas blangs nas mi byed pa tsam yin pa'i phyir dang / 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams la brten nas 'dogs pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: sogs pa zhes bya ba'i sgras ni khas blangs nas mi byed pa tsam yin pa'i phyir dang / 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po rnams la brten nas 'dogs pa'i phyir la /
translated: The term ‚Äúand so on‚Äù indicates that it is merely a nonassertion because it is not created and it is imputed in dependence on past primary elements.

original: de dag kyang rang gi ngo bo la med pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin par rdzas gzhan med do zhes bya ba bsdus te /
analyzed: de dag kyang rang gi ngo bo la med pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin par rdzas gzhan med do zhes bya ba bsdus te /
translated: Since they do not exist in the nature of form, there is no other substance that is nonindicative form.

original: de'i phyir yang gang gis byas pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de'i phyir yang gang gis byas pa'i sbyor ba las byung ba zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
translated: Therefore, it is said in summary:

original: bstan du yang med la thogs pa yang med pa'i gzugs bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid ces bya ba la /
analyzed: bstan du yang med la thogs pa yang med pa'i gzugs bstan pa gang yin pa de nyid ces bya ba la /

original: ji ltar zhe na bsam gtan pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus ting nge 'dzin gyi gzugs bstan du med pa dang thogs pa med pa skye ba gang yin pa ste /
analyzed: ji ltar zhe na bsam gtan pa rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi mthus ting nge 'dzin gyi gzugs bstan du med pa dang thogs pa med pa skye ba gang yin pa ste /
translated: How is it? It is the form of concentration that arises through the power of concentration of those who are absorbed in meditative equipoise, which is not demonstrable and is not an obstruction.

original: de nyid chos kyi skye mched du gtogs pa yin no //üîΩ'tsho ba dag yod pa smos shig zhes bya ba ni 'di ni re shig smos shig ces bya ba ste /
analyzed: de nyid chos kyi skye mched du gtogs pa yin no // 'tsho ba dag yod pa smos shig zhes bya ba ni 'di ni re shig smos shig ces bya ba ste /
translated: That is included in the sense base of mental objects.üîΩThe Vaibhasikas say: Tell us what is the life faculty?

original: rgyu mtshan la rgyu @17b mtshan can nye bar btags nas so //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan la rgyu @17b mtshan can nye bar btags nas so //
translated: This is a request to tell us what it is, since it is imputed as the reason for the existence of life.

original: rgyu mtshan ni 'dir rnam par rig byed pa ma yin pa'o //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan ni 'dir rnam par rig byed pa ma yin pa'o //

original: rgyu mtshan can ni yang dag pa'i dag la sogs pa dag go //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan can ni yang dag pa'i dag la sogs pa dag go //
translated: The correct ones are right speech and so on.üîΩNonindicative form is explained as those.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la der bshad do zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho bar bshad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la der bshad do zhes bya ba ni yang dag pa'i ngag dang las kyi mtha' dang 'tsho bar bshad do zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: That is, right speech, right action, and right livelihood are explained as those.

original: bsam pa dang lus zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: bsam pa dang lus zhes bya ba la /
translated: The intention and the body.

original: bsam pa ni srog gcod pa mi byed pa'i bsam pa'o //
analyzed: bsam pa ni srog gcod pa mi byed pa'i bsam pa'o //
translated: The intention is the intention not to kill.

original: lus ni yang dag pa'i ngag la sogs pa 'jug par rung ste /
analyzed: lus ni yang dag pa'i ngag la sogs pa 'jug par rung ste /
translated: The body is suitable for engaging in right speech and so on.

original: rten yongs su gyur ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: rten yongs su gyur ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The term ‚Äútransformation of the basis‚Äù is synonymous with that.

original: de'i phyir rgyu mtshan la rgyu mtshan can nye bar btags pa byas nas zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i bsam pa dang lus lam gyi stobs kyis thob pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i ngag la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu mtshan la rgyu mtshan can nye bar btags pa byas nas zhes bya ba ni de 'dra ba'i bsam pa dang lus lam gyi stobs kyis thob pa gang yin pa de ni yang dag pa'i ngag la sogs pa'i rgyu mtshan yin te /
translated: Therefore, the term ‚Äúafter imputing the one who has the sign to the sign‚Äù means that whatever is obtained by the power of the path through such an intention and body is the sign of right speech and so on.

original: rgyu mtshan de la rgyu mtshan can nye bar btags pa byas nas lam yan lag brgyad rnam par gzhag go //
analyzed: rgyu mtshan de la rgyu mtshan can nye bar btags pa byas nas lam yan lag brgyad rnam par gzhag go //
translated: The eightfold noble path is posited as a designation for the cause of that.

original: de dag mi byed pa tsam zhes bya ba ni log pa'i ngag la mi byed pa tsam mo //
analyzed: de dag mi byed pa tsam zhes bya ba ni log pa'i ngag la mi byed pa tsam mo //
translated: The mere nonperformance of those is called the right speech and so on of the noble ones.

original: de gang zhig ce na /
analyzed: de gang zhig ce na /
translated: What is that?

original: 'di yang 'phags pa'i lam gyi mthus zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
analyzed: 'di yang 'phags pa'i lam gyi mthus zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o //
translated: It is the mere nonperformance of wrong speech and so on.

original: lam dag ni zag pa med pa'i yin na /
analyzed: lam dag ni zag pa med pa'i yin na /
translated: If the paths are uncontaminated,

analyzed: mi byed pa tsam ni zag pa med pa yin par mi 'os pas de lam nyid du mi rung ngo zhe na /
translated: the mere nonperformance of those is not suitable to be uncontaminated, and therefore it is not suitable to be the path.

analyzed: de'i phyir de yang zag pa med pa'i lam la brten nas thob pa'i phyir zag pa med pa yin na zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore it is said, Because that is obtained in dependence on the uncontaminated path, it is uncontaminated.

original: gal te de dag mi byed pa tsam po zag pa med pa ni rdzas su med pa yin pas ji ltar lam yan lag brgyad du zhe na /
analyzed: gal te de dag mi byed pa tsam po zag pa med pa ni rdzas su med pa yin pas ji ltar lam yan lag brgyad du zhe na /
translated: If the mere nonperformance of those is uncontaminated, it does not substantially exist, so how can it be the eightfold noble path?

original: de'i phyir thams cad rdzas su yod pa'i chos zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir thams cad rdzas su yod pa'i chos zhes bya ba rgyas par smos so //
translated: Therefore it is said, All are phenomena that substantially exist.

original: gang yang so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yang mang bar 'gyur te zhes smra ba de'i dbang du byas nas /
analyzed: gang yang so sor thar pa'i sdom pa yang mang bar 'gyur te zhes smra ba de'i dbang du byas nas /

analyzed: so so thar pa'i sdom par yang 'gyur te zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: In response to that, it says, ‚ÄúThey would also be pratimoksa vows.‚Äù

analyzed: sems pa gang gi cho ga sngon du btang ba zhes bya ba ni bsnyen par rdzogs pa'i cho gas zhes bya ba'i tha tshig ste sems pa de sdom pa yin no //

original: de lta na 'o na sems gzhan dang ldan pa ma bsdams par 'gyur te /
analyzed: de lta na 'o na sems gzhan dang ldan pa ma bsdams par 'gyur te /
translated: If that is so, then one possessing a different mind would not be restrained.

original: sdom pa'i sems pa'i sems las sems gzhan dang ldan pa ma bsdams par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sdom pa'i sems pa'i sems las sems gzhan dang ldan pa ma bsdams par 'gyur ro //
translated: One possessing a different mind from the mind of volition that is a vow would not be restrained.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: sems pa gang gis @18a * //
analyzed: sems pa gang gis @18a * //
translated: Because the volition

original: lus dang ngag sdom pa'i sems pa de de'i tshe yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lus dang ngag sdom pa'i sems pa de de'i tshe yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: ma yin te de la goms pas zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: ma yin te de la goms pas zhes bya ba ni /
translated: No, because one is habituated to that.

original: sdom pa'i sems pa des sems kyi rgyud la de'i rang bzhin can gyi sems zhes pa ma 'ongs pa skyed la sa bon du gzhag pa gang yin pa de'i ngo bo'i goms pas so //

translated: That intention to take up vows generates a future mind having that nature, and it is that which is posited as the seed.

original: bya ba'i dus su zhes bya ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'i dus su ste /
analyzed: bya ba'i dus su zhes bya ba ni srog gcod pa la sogs pa'i sbyor ba'i dus su ste /
translated: At the time of action means at the time of preparation for taking life and so on.

translated: Because one abides in the mind that remembers the vow, thinking I have turned away from taking life and so on, one abides in the mind that promises not to do it.

analyzed: de ltar na sdom pa'i sems pa rgyun dang bcas pa sdom pa yin no zhes bstan pa yin no //

original: gang yang chu lon du yang gsungs na zhes smras pa /
analyzed: gang yang chu lon du yang gsungs na zhes smras pa /
translated: But it is also said to be a dam.

original: de'i phyir chu lon gyi ngo bo yang 'gyur te zhes bya ba smos te sdom pa'i sems pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
analyzed: de'i phyir chu lon gyi ngo bo yang 'gyur te zhes bya ba smos te sdom pa'i sems pa zhes bya ba dang sbyar ro //
translated: Therefore it is said that it is also the nature of a dam, which is connected to the statement that it is the intention to take vows.

analyzed: de lta bu'i don du de yang dag par lan pa yin no zhes bya ba ni / ci nas kyang mi byed pa dam bcas pa dran pas 'tshal ba'i tshul khrims mi byed par bya ba'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of that is that one is truly restrained for the sake of that.üîΩOne should not commit transgressions of morality through forgetfulness, in order to remember the promise not to commit transgressions.

original: brjed ngas pa 'gas kyang tshul khrims 'dral bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: brjed ngas pa 'gas kyang tshul khrims 'dral bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni /
translated: One does not break morality through forgetfulness.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la chu yon du brjod pa de ni brjed ngas pa'i dus na yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa la chu yon du brjod pa de ni brjed ngas pa'i dus na yang yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The noninformative that is the vow is present even when one is forgetful.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rnam par rig byed dang lhan cig 'byung la /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rnam par rig byed dang lhan cig 'byung la /
translated: The noninformative exists simultaneously with the informative.üîΩThe informative is derived from the great elements that are the cause of speech.

original: rnam par rig byed kyang 'byung ba chen po ngag rgyur byas pa yin pas the tshom za nas 'dri ba ni de ci rnam par rig byed kyi 'byung ba dag kho na rgyur byas nas zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'o //üîΩtshogs pa de nyid la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed kyang 'byung ba chen po ngag rgyur byas pa yin pas the tshom za nas 'dri ba ni de ci rnam par rig byed kyi 'byung ba dag kho na rgyur byas nas zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'o // tshogs pa de nyid la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Therefore, one who is doubtful asks, ‚ÄúIs it derived from the great elements that are the cause of the informative alone?‚Äù

original: sa la sogs pa 'byung ba bzhi'o //
analyzed: sa la sogs pa 'byung ba bzhi'o //
translated: The collection itself is the four great elements such as earth.

original: 'bras bu phra mo zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: 'bras bu phra mo zhes bya ba la /
translated: Subtle matter is called the result.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa'i phyir phra mo yin la /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni bstan du med cing thogs pa med pa'i phyir phra mo yin la /
translated: Non-informative matter is subtle because it is invisible and non-resistant.

original: sa rnam par rig byed ni thogs pa dang bcas pa yin no //üîΩrgyur byas pa'i gzugs phal cher zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: sa rnam par rig byed ni thogs pa dang bcas pa yin no // rgyur byas pa'i gzugs phal cher zhes bya ba la /
translated: The informative matter of the realm of desire is resistant.üîΩThe majority of derivative form is derived from the four great elements.

original: 'dod par gtogs pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs pa da ltar byung ba'i 'byung ba chen po rnams rgyur byas pa las skye'o //
analyzed: 'dod par gtogs pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ma gtogs pa da ltar byung ba'i 'byung ba chen po rnams rgyur byas pa las skye'o //
translated: Except for non-informative matter belonging to the realm of desire, the present great elements are the cause from which it is derived.üîΩNon-informative matter belonging to the realm of desire arises in a single moment.

original: 'dod gtogs rnam rig byed min skad cig /
analyzed: 'dod gtogs rnam rig byed min skad cig /
translated: Non-informative matter belonging to the realm of desire arises in a single moment.

original: @18b ces bya ba la rnam par rig byed dang lhan cig skyes pa'i 'byung ba rnams thams cad kyi ma 'ongs pa nyid de rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rgyun skyed pa la rgyur 'gyur bas de'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skad cig ma
analyzed: @18b ces bya ba la rnam par rig byed dang lhan cig skyes pa'i 'byung ba rnams thams cad kyi ma 'ongs pa nyid de rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i rgyun skyed pa la rgyur 'gyur bas de'i phyir rnam par rig byed ma yin pa skad cig ma
translated: The future great elements that arise simultaneously with informative matter are the cause of the arising of the stream of non-informative matter. Therefore, non-informative matter arises in a single moment.

original: dang po ma gtogs pa skad cig ma gzhan gang yin pa de thams cad ni 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas te gdags so //
analyzed: dang po ma gtogs pa skad cig ma gzhan gang yin pa de thams cad ni 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas te gdags so //
translated: All other moments, except for the first, are said to be derived from the primary elements of the past.

original: skad cig ma dang po ni lhan cig skyes pa'i 'byung ba chen po kho na rgyur byas nas skye'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma dang po ni lhan cig skyes pa'i 'byung ba chen po kho na rgyur byas nas skye'o //
translated: The first moment arises from the primary elements that are simultaneous with it.

original: de nyid kyi phyir skad cig phyin chad ces bya ba khyad par ro //
analyzed: de nyid kyi phyir skad cig phyin chad ces bya ba khyad par ro //
translated: That is why the root text says, ‚Äúfrom the second moment onward.‚Äù

original: 'dod gtogs zhes bya ba smos pa ni bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa sdom pa gcad par bya ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'dod gtogs zhes bya ba smos pa ni bsam gtan dang zag pa med pa sdom pa gcad par bya ba'i phyir te /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúbelonging to the desire realm‚Äù is mentioned in order to exclude the vows of meditative discipline and uncontaminated vows.

original: de dag gi rten 'byung ba chen po rnams ni sems dang 'dra bar dus mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag gi rten 'byung ba chen po rnams ni sems dang 'dra bar dus mnyam pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The primary elements that support those vows are simultaneous with the mind.

original: de dag ni 'di'i gzhi'i don du 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: de dag ni 'di'i gzhi'i don du 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni /
translated: They are the basis for those vows.

original: dper na da ltar byung ba'i 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas pa'i gzugs gzhan gyi rten yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na da ltar byung ba'i 'byung ba chen po dag rgyur byas pa'i gzugs gzhan gyi rten yin pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, the primary elements of the present are the basis for the form that is derived from the primary elements.

original: 'jug pa dang rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir go rims bzhin te zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag ni 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir gzhi'i don du 'gyur la /
analyzed: 'jug pa dang rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir go rims bzhin te zhes bya ba ni 'das pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag ni 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir gzhi'i don du 'gyur la /
translated: Because they are, respectively, the cause of projection and the cause of generation.üîΩThe past primary elements are the cause of projection, and thus they are the basis.

original: da ltar byung ba'i lus 'byung ba chen po'i rten gyi don gyis so //
analyzed: da ltar byung ba'i lus 'byung ba chen po'i rten gyi don gyis so //
translated: The present primary elements of the body are the basis in the sense of being the support of the primary elements.

original: lag pas 'phul ba ni 'jug pa'i rgyu'o //
analyzed: lag pas 'phul ba ni 'jug pa'i rgyu'o //
translated: The hand is the cause of projection.

original: sa'i phyogs ni rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyu'o //üîΩ'byung ba dang lus dang ngag gi las rnam lnga pa yin pa'i phyir 'dri ba ni /
analyzed: sa'i phyogs ni rjes su 'jug pa'i rgyu'o // 'byung ba dang lus dang ngag gi las rnam lnga pa yin pa'i phyir 'dri ba ni /
translated: The ground is the cause of generation.üîΩThe question is asked, ‚ÄúIn what realms are the five types of action found?‚Äù

original: yang gang na yod pa'i lus dang ngag gi las zhes rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: yang gang na yod pa'i lus dang ngag gi las zhes rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: The answer is, ‚ÄúIn the realm of desire, all five types of action exist.‚Äù

original: bsam gtan bzhi pa yan chad na 'byung ba dag med pa'i phyir dang / lus dang ngag gi las med pa'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i bar zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: bsam gtan bzhi pa yan chad na 'byung ba dag med pa'i phyir dang / lus dang ngag gi las med pa'i phyir bsam gtan bzhi pa'i sa pa'i bar zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: ‚ÄúUp to the fourth meditation‚Äù is stated because the primary elements do not exist above the fourth meditation, and bodily and verbal action do not exist there.

original: khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'di la skye ba kho na nges pa'i rgyu yin gyi rang gi sa pa'i nyid ni ma yin te /
analyzed: khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni 'di la skye ba kho na nges pa'i rgyu yin gyi rang gi sa pa'i nyid ni ma yin te /
translated: Because it is not included in the elements means that the cause that definitely produces it is birth alone, not its own level.

original: zag pa med pa ni ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes ston to //
analyzed: zag pa med pa ni ldan pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro zhes ston to //
translated: This is because uncontaminated states are not possessed.

original: de ltar na 'o na zag pa med pa'i 'byung ba dag kho na rgyur byas pa las 'byung ngo zhe na /
analyzed: de ltar na 'o na zag pa med pa'i 'byung ba dag kho na rgyur byas pa las 'byung ngo zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then it arises from uncontaminated primary elements alone.

original: de'i phyir zag pa med pa'i 'byung ba dag med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos so //
analyzed: de'i phyir zag pa med pa'i 'byung ba dag med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba smos so //
translated: Therefore it says, because uncontaminated primary elements do not exist.

original: de lta na ni 'o na 'byung ba la bltos pa med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: de lta na ni 'o na 'byung ba la bltos pa med par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: If that is so, then it would not rely on primary elements.

original: de'i phyir de'i @19a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir de'i @19a * //
translated: Therefore it says,

original: stobs kyis skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: stobs kyis skye ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: because it arises through their power.

original: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni 'byung ba la ma ltos par mi 'byung la /
analyzed: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs ni 'byung ba la ma ltos par mi 'byung la /
translated: Form derived from the elements does not arise without relying on primary elements.

original: sems tsam gyi stobs kyis skye na ni 'di rgyur byas pa'i gzugs yin pa nyid la gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: sems tsam gyi stobs kyis skye na ni 'di rgyur byas pa'i gzugs yin pa nyid la gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If it arises through the power of mind alone, then it would not be form derived from the elements.

original: der yang rnam par rig byed dang rig byed ma yin pa'i las rnams rig par bya'o //
analyzed: der yang rnam par rig byed dang rig byed ma yin pa'i las rnams rig par bya'o //
translated: Also, in this case, the actions of informative form and non-informative form should be understood.

original: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni rnam pa gnyis te /
translated: Non-informative form is twofold:

original: mnyam par gzhag pa'i las dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa'i las dang mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa'o //
translated: the action of equipoise and the action of nonequipoise.

original: de la rnam rig byed min ma zin dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
analyzed: de la rnam rig byed min ma zin dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ngo //
translated: Non-informative form is not conjoined,

original: yul na mi gnas pa'i phyir dang / sems dang sems las byung ba dag gis rten gyi dngos por ma bzung ba'i phyir na ma zin pa'o //
analyzed: yul na mi gnas pa'i phyir dang / sems dang sems las byung ba dag gis rten gyi dngos por ma bzung ba'i phyir na ma zin pa'o //
translated: because it does not exist in a place and because it is not apprehended as the basis of mind and mental factors.

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyus skyed pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa las 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba'i skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyus skyed pa'i phyir rgyu mthun pa las 'byung ba'o //
translated: It arises from natural outflow, because it is generated by the cause of the same status of virtue and nonvirtue.

original: dge ba dang mi dge ba yin pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ni ma yin te /
analyzed: dge ba dang mi dge ba yin pa'i phyir rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ni ma yin te /
translated: It is not derived from the cause of karmic maturation, because it is virtuous and nonvirtuous.

original: rnam smin lung du ma bstan zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam smin lung du ma bstan zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is said that karmic maturation is neutral.

original: rgyas pa las byung ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyas pa las byung ba yang ma yin te /
translated: It is also not derived from enhancement,üîΩbecause it is not derived from the four causes of enhancement.

original: rdul phra rab bsags pa med pa'i phyir dang / de skye ba rnam par shes pa la bltas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rdul phra rab bsags pa med pa'i phyir dang / de skye ba rnam par shes pa la bltas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not a composite of subtle particles, and because its arising is dependent on consciousness.

original: sems can du ston pa yin te lus dang ngag gi las kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir dang sems can gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sems can du ston pa yin te lus dang ngag gi las kyi mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir dang sems can gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is called ‚Äúindicative of sentient beings‚Äù because it is characterized by the actions of body and speech, and because it is included in the life-stream of sentient beings.

original: 'di ni khyad par yin te /
analyzed: 'di ni khyad par yin te /
translated: This is the difference.

original: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa yin na ni /
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag pa'i sa pa yin na ni /
translated: If it is on the level of non-concentration,

original: rgyu mthun zin pa'i 'byung las skyes /
analyzed: rgyu mthun zin pa'i 'byung las skyes /
translated: it arises from the great elements that are the cause of maturation.

original: rgyas pa las byung ba'i 'byung ba las skye ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: rgyas pa las byung ba'i 'byung ba las skye ba ni ma yin te /
translated: It does not arise from the great elements that are the cause of development,

original: de'i rten gyi 'byung ba chen po dag skad cig gcig pa yin pa'i phyir dang / rgyas pa pa las byung ba'i 'byung ba chen po dag ni rgyun chags par rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rten gyi 'byung ba chen po dag skad cig gcig pa yin pa'i phyir dang / rgyas pa pa las byung ba'i 'byung ba chen po dag ni rgyun chags par rjes su 'jug pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the great elements that are its support are momentary, and because the great elements that are the cause of development continue in a series.

original: ma zin pa'i 'byung ba las skye ba yang ma yin te /
analyzed: ma zin pa'i 'byung ba las skye ba yang ma yin te /
translated: It does not arise from the great elements that are not conjoined,

original: de'i 'byung ba chen po dag lus kyi 'byung ba chen po dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i 'byung ba chen po dag lus kyi 'byung ba chen po dang tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because its great elements are not different from the great elements of the body.

original: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa ni rgyas pa las byung ba dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /üîΩrgyas pa las byung ba'i 'byung ba las skye'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'byung ba las skye ba ni ma yin te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa ni rgyas pa las byung ba dang zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste / rgyas pa las byung ba'i 'byung ba las skye'i rgyu mthun pa'i 'byung ba las skye ba ni ma yin te /
translated: That derived from meditative attainment is derived from enhancement.

original: de'i rten 'byung ba chen po ting @19b nge 'dzin las skyes pa rgyas pa las byung ba las ma gtogs pa'i rgyu mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩma zin pa'i 'byung ba las skyes pa kho na yin gyi zin pa'i 'byung ba las skyes pa ni ma yin te 'byung ba chen po rnams sems la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rten 'byung ba chen po ting @19b nge 'dzin las skyes pa rgyas pa las byung ba las ma gtogs pa'i rgyu mthun pa med pa'i phyir ro // ma zin pa'i 'byung ba las skyes pa kho na yin gyi zin pa'i 'byung ba las skyes pa ni ma yin te 'byung ba chen po rnams sems la rag las pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It arises from the primary elements derived from enhancement, not from the primary elements that are the result of natural outflow because the primary elements that are its basis are derived from enhancement, not from the primary elements that are the result of natural outflow.üîΩIt arises from primary elements that are not held up by mind, not from primary elements held up by mind because the primary elements are dependent on mind.

original: zin pa rnams ni sems la bltos pa med par 'jug go //
analyzed: zin pa rnams ni sems la bltos pa med par 'jug go //
translated: Primary elements that are held up by mind do not arise from primary elements that are not held up by mind because the primary elements that are held up by mind are not independent of mind.

original: tha dad min las skyes zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po gang dag kho na rgyur byas na srog gcod pa spong ba skye ba de dag kho na las tshig kyal pa spang ba'i bar du skye'o zhes bya'o //üîΩsems bzhin du 'byung ba tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dper na de skyed par byed pa'i sems tha mi dad de /
analyzed: tha dad min las skyes zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba chen po gang dag kho na rgyur byas na srog gcod pa spong ba skye ba de dag kho na las tshig kyal pa spang ba'i bar du skye'o zhes bya'o // sems bzhin du 'byung ba tha mi dad pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni dper na de skyed par byed pa'i sems tha mi dad de /
translated: The phrase ‚Äúarisen from undifferentiated‚Äù means that the great elements that are the cause of the arising of the avoidance of taking life are the same great elements that are the cause of the arising of the avoidance of idle speech.üîΩBecause the elements are not differentiated like the mind.

original: srog gcod pa la sogs pa spong ba thams cad kyi sems lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pas tha mi dad pa de bzhin du skyed par byed pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag kyang spong ba thams cad la tha mi dad pa yin no //
analyzed: srog gcod pa la sogs pa spong ba thams cad kyi sems lhan cig 'byung ba'i rgyu yin pas tha mi dad pa de bzhin du skyed par byed pa'i 'byung ba chen po dag kyang spong ba thams cad la tha mi dad pa yin no //
translated: Just as the mind that generates the avoidance of taking life is not differentiated from the mind that generates the avoidance of idle speech, because the mind that accompanies all the abandonments of taking life and so on is the homogeneous cause, in the same way, the great elements that generate the avoidance of taking life are not differentiated from the great elements that generate the avoidance of idle speech, because the great elements that are the cause of all the abandonments are the cause of the avoidance of taking life and so on.

original: yang rgyu cis mnyam par ma bzhag pa las rgyu mthun pa'i 'byung ba skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: yang rgyu cis mnyam par ma bzhag pa las rgyu mthun pa'i 'byung ba skye bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: Why do the great elements that are natural outflow arise from nonconcentrated mind?

original: mnyam par gzhag pa las ni rgyas pa las byung ba sems kyi khyad par mngon du gyur pa'i 'byung ba nye bar bsags pa yod pa'i phyir dang / sems dang lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa las 'byung ba rgyas pa las byung ba rnams so //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa las ni rgyas pa las byung ba sems kyi khyad par mngon du gyur pa'i 'byung ba nye bar bsags pa yod pa'i phyir dang / sems dang lhan cig spyod pa'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa las 'byung ba rgyas pa las byung ba rnams so //
translated: Those that arise from equipoise are those that arise from enhancement, because they are the actualization of a special mind that is derived from enhancement, and because they are concomitant with the mind.

original: mnyam par ma bzhag pa las ni de'i kun slong gi sems las mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems med par 'byung ba rgyas pa las byung ba de skye ba med pas so //
analyzed: mnyam par ma bzhag pa las ni de'i kun slong gi sems las mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems med par 'byung ba rgyas pa las byung ba de skye ba med pas so //
translated: Those that arise from nonequipoise are those that arise from enhancement, because they are not generated from a mind of equipoise, but from a mind that is its motivating cause.

original: kha cig ni rgyu mthun pa las ma yin te /
analyzed: kha cig ni rgyu mthun pa las ma yin te /
translated: Some say: They are not derived from natural outflow.

original: rgyu mthun pa sngar 'gags pa'i 'byung ba bzhi tshan las so zhes so //
analyzed: rgyu mthun pa sngar 'gags pa'i 'byung ba bzhi tshan las so zhes so //
translated: They arise from the four primary elements that are the natural outflow of previously ceased primary elements.

original: thogs pa dang bcas pa thogs pa med pa'i 'byung ba las gyur pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyi phyir de dag gi de rnams rgyu mthun par mi rung ngo //
analyzed: thogs pa dang bcas pa thogs pa med pa'i 'byung ba las gyur pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyi phyir de dag gi de rnams rgyu mthun par mi rung ngo //
translated: Because they are the result of resistant and nonresistant primary elements, it is illogical that they are derived from natural outflow.

original: de ltar nges par thogs pa med pa'i 'byung ba'i 'bras bu rnams aa n'a doo 'gags pa rnams der rgyu mthun pa de rnams su 'gyur ro zhes smra bar byed do //
analyzed: de ltar nges par thogs pa med pa'i 'byung ba'i 'bras bu rnams aa n'a doo 'gags pa rnams der rgyu mthun pa de rnams su 'gyur ro zhes smra bar byed do //
translated: Thus, the result of the primary elements that are definitely unobscured arise from the primary elements that are unobscured.üîΩThe result of the primary elements that are not conjoined with meditative attainment are the primary elements that are not conjoined with meditative attainment.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa'i ma zin pa rnams ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyi 'bras bu (dang po ma yin pa a'a di la di byin di snga ma dang bcas aa'o sngon du dgag pa'i na dang / dbyangs la yi ge bzlog pa'i cho ga byas pa yin nam dpyad/) @20a * //üîΩyin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa'i ma zin pa rnams ni mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyi 'bras bu (dang po ma yin pa a'a di la di byin di snga ma dang bcas aa'o sngon du dgag pa'i na dang / dbyangs la yi ge bzlog pa'i cho ga byas pa yin nam dpyad/) @20a * // yin pa'i phyir /
translated: This is because they are the result of the mind of meditative attainment.

original: de rnams lus la srid pa rgyur byas pa ma yin pa zin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de rnams lus la srid pa rgyur byas pa ma yin pa zin pa ma yin no //
translated: They are not conjoined with the body, since they are not derived from the primary elements that exist in the body.

original: de dag gi mtshan nyid la yod pa ni kha dog skyed par byed pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhin no //
analyzed: de dag gi mtshan nyid la yod pa ni kha dog skyed par byed pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhin no //
translated: They are like the primary elements that generate color.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa'i zin pa rnams ni rten la rag las te de skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa'i zin pa rnams ni rten la rag las te de skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: They are conjoined with meditative attainment because they arise in dependence on the basis.

original: yang ci'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa dang tha dad pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang tha dad pa rnams phan tshun gyi stobs kyis 'bras bu gcig skyed par byed ce na /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir mnyam par gzhag pa dang tha dad pa dang / mnyam par ma bzhag pa dang tha dad pa rnams phan tshun gyi stobs kyis 'bras bu gcig skyed par byed ce na /
translated: Why do the different states of meditative equipoise and non-meditative equipoise generate a single result through the power of each other?

original: 'byung ba bzhi tshan gcig nyid 'bras bu rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bdun du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'byung ba bzhi tshan gcig nyid 'bras bu rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bdun du 'gyur ro //
translated: One set of four primary elements becomes the seven types of non-revealing form.

original: bzlog pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa las tha mi dad pa rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i 'bras bu rnams rgyu mtshungs par grub pa'i phyir rim pa gcig gis rim pa thams cad du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: bzlog pa ni mnyam par gzhag pa las tha mi dad pa rnam par rig byed ma yin pa'i 'bras bu rnams rgyu mtshungs par grub pa'i phyir rim pa gcig gis rim pa thams cad du 'gyur ro //
translated: The opposite is also true: the results of non-revealing karma that is not different from meditative equipoise are established as being the same cause as the results of non-revealing karma that is different from meditative equipoise.

original: mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam par rig byed bzhin cig car mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rnam pa rnam pa bdun yang rung ngo //
analyzed: mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam par rig byed bzhin cig car mnyam par gzhag pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rnam pa rnam pa bdun yang rung ngo //
translated: Just as revealing karma is simultaneous with meditative equipoise, non-revealing karma is also of seven types.

original: rnam par rig byed ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba yin pas /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ni rgyu mthun pa las byung ba yin pas /
translated: Revealing karma arises from natural outflow.

original: rnam par rig byed skyed pa'i 'byung ba rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa sems can du ston pa'o //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed skyed pa'i 'byung ba rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa sems can du ston pa'o //
translated: The great elements that are the cause of the arising of informative form are the homogeneous cause of the informative form that is indicative of sentient beings.

original: ji ltar 'phen pa 'dir 'jug pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rgyu mthun pa las byung ba ste /
analyzed: ji ltar 'phen pa 'dir 'jug pas rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rgyu mthun pa las byung ba ste /
translated: How does it arise from the cause of the great elements that are the cause of the arising of informative form?üîΩIt arises from the cause of the great elements that are the cause of the arising of informative form.

original: 'di yang dang yang 'grib pa ma yin zhing mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems las skye ba ma yin zhing rgyas pa las byung yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'di yang dang yang 'grib pa ma yin zhing mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems las skye ba ma yin zhing rgyas pa las byung yang ma yin no //
translated: It is not derived by increase, because it does not increase through nourishment.

original: zin pa ni lus kyis zhes bya ste lus kyi 'byung ba chen po dang tha mi dad par 'jug pa'i phyir lus kyis zin pa la /
analyzed: zin pa ni lus kyis zhes bya ste lus kyi 'byung ba chen po dang tha mi dad par 'jug pa'i phyir lus kyis zin pa la /
translated: It is said to be conjoined with the body because it is not distinct from the great elements of the body.

original: de dag ni zin pa ma yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de dag ni zin pa ma yin no zhes bshad par 'gyur ro //
translated: It is said to be not conjoined because it is not conjoined with the body.

original: yang ci'i phyir rig byed 'di skye ba na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: yang ci'i phyir rig byed 'di skye ba na zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: Why is it said that when this informative form arises, it arises from the cause of the great elements that are the cause of the arising of informative form?

original: rnam par rig byed de ni sngar gyi dbyibs kyi rgyun ma zhig par rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i 'byung ba chen po gzhan dag kho na rgyur byas nas skye ste lha'i mig bzhin no //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed de ni sngar gyi dbyibs kyi rgyun ma zhig par rgyu mthun pa las byung ba'i 'byung ba chen po gzhan dag kho na rgyur byas nas skye ste lha'i mig bzhin no //
translated: This is because the great elements that are the cause of the form of informative action arise from the homogeneous cause of the great elements that are the cause of the previous form of informative action, just as the divine eye arises from the homogeneous cause of the great elements that are the cause of the eye of flesh.

original: kha cig na re rnam par rig byed kyi dbyibs kyi 'byung ba chen po dag ni phra ba'i phyir mi dmigs te /
analyzed: kha cig na re rnam par rig byed kyi dbyibs kyi 'byung ba chen po dag ni phra ba'i phyir mi dmigs te /
translated: Some say: The great elements that are the cause of the form of informative action are not observed because they are subtle,

original: yan lag gi mtshan bzhin no zhes zer ro /
analyzed: yan lag gi mtshan bzhin no zhes zer ro /
translated: just as the characteristics of the limbs are not observed.

original: gzhan dag na re lus la gos pa yod pa'i phyir te de dag @20b gi go skabs yod do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re lus la gos pa yod pa'i phyir te de dag @20b gi go skabs yod do zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say: The great elements that are the cause of the form of informative action are not observed because they are obstructed by the great elements that are the cause of the form of non-informative action.

original: de ltar rnam par smin pa'i gzugs chad pa yang rgyun chags pa'i nyes pa yang med la /
analyzed: de ltar rnam par smin pa'i gzugs chad pa yang rgyun chags pa'i nyes pa yang med la /
translated: Thus, the fault of the continuum being severed does not occur,

original: 'byung ba'i tshogs gcig la dbyibs gnyis gang la brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba chen por 'gyur ba dang / yan lag tha dad kyis rnam par rig par byed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i tshogs gcig la dbyibs gnyis gang la brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba chen por 'gyur ba dang / yan lag tha dad kyis rnam par rig par byed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: and the fault of two forms of shape arising in dependence on a single collection of the great elements does not occur, nor is there the fault of informative action being known by different limbs.

original: gal te rnam par smin pa'i gzugs chad pa yang rgyun chad pa'i nyes pa yang med la /
analyzed: gal te rnam par smin pa'i gzugs chad pa yang rgyun chad pa'i nyes pa yang med la /
translated: If the form of karmic maturation were interrupted, there would be the fault of the continuum being severed.

original: 'byung ba'i tshogs gcig la dbyibs gnyis gang la brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba chen por 'gyur ba dang / yan lag mtha' dag gis rnam par rig par byed pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: 'byung ba'i tshogs gcig la dbyibs gnyis gang la brten nas skye bar 'gyur ba chen por 'gyur ba dang / yan lag mtha' dag gis rnam par rig par byed pa yang ma yin no //
translated: And it is not that the shape of one collection of primary elements arises in dependence on another shape, because that would be illogical and because it would be impossible for the shape of the collection of primary elements to be known by all its parts.

original: gal te rnam par smin pa'i gzugs chad pa yang mtshams mi sbyor na ci ltar dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa 'ga' zhig yang mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur /
analyzed: gal te rnam par smin pa'i gzugs chad pa yang mtshams mi sbyor na ci ltar dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa 'ga' zhig yang mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur /
translated: If the form of karmic maturation were interrupted and did not link with another, how could it link with another when it belongs to the animal realm?

original: de rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa phan tshun skye'i /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rgyu mthun pa phan tshun skye'i /
translated: The form of karmic maturation is not born from the mutual generation of homogeneous causes.

original: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ni ma yin pas dmyal ba rnams dang lha rnams kyang ji ltar nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: rnam par smin pa las skyes pa ni ma yin pas dmyal ba rnams dang lha rnams kyang ji ltar nying mtshams sbyor bar 'gyur zhe na /
translated: But how could it link with another when it belongs to the hells or gods?

original: mi rnams kyi dbang du byas te mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pas skyon med do //
analyzed: mi rnams kyi dbang du byas te mtshan nyid rnam par gzhag pas skyon med do //
translated: There is no fault because the characteristics are established from the perspective of humans.

original: rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam pa gnyis zhes bya ba la /
translated: The two types of form are the form of karmic maturation and the form of enhancement.

original: de ni sems pa dang des byas zhes bya ba'o //
analyzed: de ni sems pa dang des byas zhes bya ba'o //
translated: This is what is called ‚Äúintention‚Äù and ‚Äúthat which is done by intention.‚Äù

original: rnam pa gsum zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: rnam pa gsum zhes bya ba ni /
translated: Three types:

original: sems pa dang rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rnams so //
analyzed: sems pa dang rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa rnams so //
translated: intention, indicative form, and nonindicative form.

original: yang na sems pa yid kyi las yin te /
analyzed: yang na sems pa yid kyi las yin te /
translated: Or else, intention is mental action,

original: des skyed lus dang ngag gi las zhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: des skyed lus dang ngag gi las zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: and the action of body and speech are generated by it.

original: rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag gi las re re la rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin par phye la sems pa yid kyi las yin no zhes bya ba dang rnam par bshad pa yin no //
analyzed: rnam pa lnga zhes bya ba ni lus dang ngag gi las re re la rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin par phye la sems pa yid kyi las yin no zhes bya ba dang rnam par bshad pa yin no //
translated: Five types: each of the actions of body and speech is divided into indicative form and nonindicative form, and intention is mental action.üîΩThis is the explanation.

original: de la zhes bya ba ni las rnam pa lnga las so //
analyzed: de la zhes bya ba ni las rnam pa lnga las so //
translated: Among these,

original: rnam rig min lung bstan min med //
analyzed: rnam rig min lung bstan min med //
translated: nonindicative form does not exist in the formless realm.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: de skye ba ni kun nas slong bar byed pa stobs dang ldan pa la bltos pa'i phyir dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems ni stobs chung ba yin no //
analyzed: de skye ba ni kun nas slong bar byed pa stobs dang ldan pa la bltos pa'i phyir dang / lung du ma bstan pa'i sems ni stobs chung ba yin no //
translated: Because its arising depends on powerful motivation, and neutral minds are weak.

original: gal te 'gags kyang de la sems gzhan dang sems rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur bas zhes bya ba la de slong par byed pa lung du ma bstan pa'i de la'o //üîΩrnam par rig byed @21a * //
analyzed: gal te 'gags kyang de la sems gzhan dang sems rjes su 'brel bar 'gyur bas zhes bya ba la de slong par byed pa lung du ma bstan pa'i de la'o // rnam par rig byed @21a * //
translated: If it were to cease, then the mind would be related to another mind.

original: ma yin pa ni de'i skad cig pa yod pa yang ma yin te /üîΩdge dang mi dge'i rjes 'brel gang //
analyzed: ma yin pa ni de'i skad cig pa yod pa yang ma yin te / dge dang mi dge'i rjes 'brel gang //
translated: Nonindicative form does not exist in the moment of its arising because it is said:

original: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: zhes 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: That which is related to virtue and nonvirtue.

original: rnam par rig byed dang sems pa'o zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: rnam par rig byed dang sems pa'o zhes bya ba la /
translated: Indicative form and intention

original: rnam par rig byed ces bya bas ni lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed bsdu'o //
analyzed: rnam par rig byed ces bya bas ni lus dang ngag gi rnam par rig byed bsdu'o //
translated: Indicative form refers to the indicative form of body and speech.

original: gzhan na ni med de zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: gzhan na ni med de zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: It does not exist in other realms

original: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams gnyis na'o //
analyzed: gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams gnyis na'o //
translated: It does not exist in the two realms of form and the formless.

original: mi dge ba'i las mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas sam kun nas bslang ba'i sgo nas gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa dag spang ba'i phyir mi dge ba'i las med do //üîΩde ni rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gnyis kyis dang khams kyi rnam par gzhag pa nges par bstan pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi dge ba'i las mtshungs par ldan pa'i sgo nas sam kun nas bslang ba'i sgo nas gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams dag tu mi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams dang / ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa dag spang ba'i phyir mi dge ba'i las med do // de ni rnam par rig byed dang rnam par rig byed ma yin pa gnyis kyis dang khams kyi rnam par gzhag pa nges par bstan pa'i phyir /
translated: Nonvirtuous karma does not exist in the form and formless realms because the roots of nonvirtue and shamelessness and lack of embarrassment are abandoned there through the possession of nonvirtue and through motivation.

original: de la gzugs na 'ang rnam rig min //
analyzed: de la gzugs na 'ang rnam rig min //
translated: To indicate that nonindicative form exists there through the presentation of the elements,

original: zhes bya ba smos so //üîΩ'byung ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa rnams na 'byung ba dag med la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba smos so // 'byung ba med pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni gzugs med pa rnams na 'byung ba dag med la /
translated: it is said:üîΩNonindicative form exists in the form realm.

original: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs 'byung ba dang / rgyur ma byas pa yod pa yang ma yin pas gzugs med pa dag na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med do zhes kha cig go //
analyzed: rgyur byas pa'i gzugs 'byung ba dang / rgyur ma byas pa yod pa yang ma yin pas gzugs med pa dag na rnam par rig byed ma yin pa med do zhes kha cig go //
translated: Some say: Nonindicative form does not exist in the formless realm because the primary elements do not exist there and derivative form that is not derived from the primary elements does not exist.

original: de ltar zag pa dang bcas pa nyid la ni sdom pa dang dgag par bshad pa ma yin la zag pa med pa la ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de ltar zag pa dang bcas pa nyid la ni sdom pa dang dgag par bshad pa ma yin la zag pa med pa la ni ma yin te /
translated: Thus, it is not explained that the absorptions and the formless realm are either vows or negative commitments, because they are not contaminated.

original: skal ba mi mnyam pa'i 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas pa las skye ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skal ba mi mnyam pa'i 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas pa las skye ba'i phyir ro //
translated: They are not contaminated because they arise from the great elements that are not homogeneous with them.

original: de'i phyir rgyu gzhan smos pa ni gang na lus dang ngag 'jug pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir rgyu gzhan smos pa ni gang na lus dang ngag 'jug pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: Therefore, the other cause is stated:

original: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang ngag gi 'jug pa sdom pa'i don gyis na sdom pa zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa'i lus dang ngag gi 'jug pa sdom pa'i don gyis na sdom pa zhes bya ba ni /
translated: The meaning of vow is the restraint of the engagement of body and speech that is accompanied by shame.

original: gzugs med pa'i khams na ni lus dang ngag gi 'jug pa yod pa yang ma yin te de na de gnyis med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs med pa'i khams na ni lus dang ngag gi 'jug pa yod pa yang ma yin te de na de gnyis med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The engagement of body and speech does not exist in the formless realm because those two do not exist there.

original: 'o na 'dod pa'i khams 'dir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa la yod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'o na 'dod pa'i khams 'dir gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par zhugs pa la yod par 'gyur te /
translated: But it exists in the desire realm when one enters meditative attainment of the formless realm.

original: 'di ni 'byung ba dag dang lus dang ngag gi 'jug pa yang yod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'di ni 'byung ba dag dang lus dang ngag gi 'jug pa yang yod pa yin no //
translated: In this desire realm, the great elements, the body, and the engagement of body and speech exist.

original: zag pa med pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni gang du skyes pas @21b zag pa med pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zag pa med pa ni zag pa med pa'i 'byung ba med kyang sa de pa'i 'byung ba
analyzed: zag pa med pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa bzhin no zhes bya ba ni gang du skyes pas @21b zag pa med pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa zag pa med pa ni zag pa med pa'i 'byung ba med kyang sa de pa'i 'byung ba
translated: Wherever one is born, uncontaminated nonindicative states are uncontaminated and though uncontaminated primary elements do not exist there,

original: dag rgyur byas nas skye ba bzhin no //
analyzed: dag rgyur byas nas skye ba bzhin no //
translated: they arise taking the primary elements of that level as their cause.

original: ma yin te de ni khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
analyzed: ma yin te de ni khams su ma gtogs pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la /
translated: That is not so, because it does not belong to the realms.

original: 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sred pa dag gis bdag gir ma byas pa'i phyir na khams su ma gtogs pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'dod pa dang gzugs dang gzugs med pa na spyod pa'i sred pa dag gis bdag gir ma byas pa'i phyir na khams su ma gtogs pa nyid de /
translated: It does not belong to the realms because craving that is active in the desire, form and formless realms does not make it its object.

original: de ni khams sam sa'i sgo nas kyang bya ste 'byung ba chen po dag dang skal ba mnyam pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: de ni khams sam sa'i sgo nas kyang bya ste 'byung ba chen po dag dang skal ba mnyam pa yang ma yin la /
translated: It is not classified as a realm or level and it does not have the same quality as the primary elements.

original: skal ba mi mnyam pa yang ma yin pas de dag rgyur byas nas skye'o //
analyzed: skal ba mi mnyam pa yang ma yin pas de dag rgyur byas nas skye'o //
translated: It arises taking the primary elements as its cause, but it is not of the same quality as the primary elements.

original: gzugs med pa ni spyod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa skal pa mi mnyam pa'i 'byung ba rgyur byas nas skye bar 'os pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gzugs med pa ni spyod pa'i rnam par rig byed ma yin pa ni 'dod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa skal pa mi mnyam pa'i 'byung ba rgyur byas nas skye bar 'os pa ma yin no //
translated: Nonindicative form of the formless realm is not suitable to arise from the homogeneous primary elements of the desire and form realms.

original: ji ltar gzugs thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs she na /
analyzed: ji ltar gzugs thams cad la rgyab kyis phyogs she na /
translated: How is it that all form is turned away from?

original: de'i phyir gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
analyzed: de'i phyir gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral ba'i phyir ro zhes bya ba smos te /
translated: Therefore it says: because it is free from the discernment of form.

original: gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral ba nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: gzugs kyi 'du shes dang bral ba nyid yin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: It is because it is free from the discernment of form.

original: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa yin na zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba'i rtsa bas kun nas bslang ba'i phyir ro /
analyzed: 'chal ba'i tshul khrims de yang 'dod pa na spyod pa yin na zhes bya ba ni mi dge ba'i rtsa bas kun nas bslang ba'i phyir ro /
translated: Further, that immorality belongs to the desire realm because it is motivated by the roots of nonvirtue.

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams las zhes rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams ni 'dod pa'i khams las zhes rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: The formless realm is free from the desire realm and so on.

original: de la brten pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi rten nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la brten pa ni snyoms par 'jug pa de ma thag pa'i rkyen gyi rten nyid mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is impossible for it to be the basis of that which is supported on it because it is impossible for it to be the equivalent immediately preceding condition of meditative attainment.

original: rnam par rig pa ni rags pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams kyis 'dod pa'i khams aa n'a kar na ta /
analyzed: rnam par rig pa ni rags pa la sogs pa'i rnam pa rnams kyis 'dod pa'i khams aa n'a kar na ta /
translated: The formless realm is the object of the cognition of the formless realm.

original: 'dis dmigs pa ring ba nyid kyang bshad de bsam gtan bzhi pa nyid gzugs med par rags pa'i rnam pas dmigs pa'o //
analyzed: 'dis dmigs pa ring ba nyid kyang bshad de bsam gtan bzhi pa nyid gzugs med par rags pa'i rnam pas dmigs pa'o //
translated: This also explains the remoteness of the object, because the fourth meditative absorption is the object of the formless realm through the aspect of grossness.

original: gnyen po ring ba nyid ni 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang ma bral bar de mngon du 'gyur ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //üîΩrnam par (ma yin ma yin ma yin byed pa'i phyir ro/) / sun 'byin pa la sogs pa de rnams mi 'thad do //
analyzed: gnyen po ring ba nyid ni 'dod pa la 'dod chags dang ma bral bar de mngon du 'gyur ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro // rnam par (ma yin ma yin ma yin byed pa'i phyir ro/) / sun 'byin pa la sogs pa de rnams mi 'thad do //
translated: The remoteness of the antidote is because it is impossible for that to be realized without freedom from attachment to the desire realm.üîΩThe refutation of the formless realm is not tenable.

original: yul med par rnam par sun 'byin par nus pa ma yin no /
analyzed: yul med par rnam par sun 'byin par nus pa ma yin no /
translated: One cannot refute without an object.

original: 'dir ni gnyen po ring ba nyid dper brjod pa yin no //
analyzed: 'dir ni gnyen po ring ba nyid dper brjod pa yin no //
translated: Here, the remoteness of the antidote is given as an example.

original: rnam rig dpyod dang bcas dag na zhes bya ba ni /üîΩdpyod pa smos pa ni bsam gtan dang po mtha' dag la khyab par @22a * //
analyzed: rnam rig dpyod dang bcas dag na zhes bya ba ni / dpyod pa smos pa ni bsam gtan dang po mtha' dag la khyab par @22a * //
translated: The cognition of the formless realm is associated with investigation and analysis.

original: byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The mention of analysis is because it pervades the entire first meditative absorption.

original: 'dod pa na 'ang bsgribs pa med ces bya ba'i yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni bsam gtan dang po'i gong na yang med do zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'dod pa na 'ang bsgribs pa med ces bya ba'i yang zhes bya ba'i sgras ni bsam gtan dang po'i gong na yang med do zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The word also indicates that it does not exist above the first absorption.

original: de ltar na bsam gtan dang po kho na na yod do zhes bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar na bsam gtan dang po kho na na yod do zhes bstan to //
translated: Thus it is taught that it exists only in the first absorption.

original: de yan na zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gong bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na'o //
analyzed: de yan na zhes bya ba ni tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gong bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na'o //
translated: Above that means in the second absorption and so on above the Brahma world.

original: phyi'i 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas pa zhes bya ba ni gos dang rgyan la sogs pa'i rgyu can no //
analyzed: phyi'i 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas pa zhes bya ba ni gos dang rgyan la sogs pa'i rgyu can no //
translated: It is derived from external great elements means it is derived from the elements that are the cause of clothing, ornaments and so on.

original: 'di la kha cig bstan bcos su ldan pa gsungs pa'i phyir na 'di ni de lta ma yin te /
analyzed: 'di la kha cig bstan bcos su ldan pa gsungs pa'i phyir na 'di ni de lta ma yin te /
translated: Some say: This is not so, because the treatise Attainment of Knowledge declares that it possesses form.

original: 'di skad gang zhig sgra'i khams dang ldan zhe na /
analyzed: 'di skad gang zhig sgra'i khams dang ldan zhe na /
translated: It says: Who possesses the element of sound?

original: smras pa 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'o //
analyzed: smras pa 'dod pa na spyod pa dang gzugs na spyod pa'o //
translated: It is said: It is possessed in the desire realm and the form realm.

original: gang zhig ldan pa ma yin zhe na /
analyzed: gang zhig ldan pa ma yin zhe na /
translated: Who does not possess it?

original: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'o zhes gsungs na /
analyzed: gzugs med pa na spyod pa'o zhes gsungs na /
translated: It is possessed in the formless realm.

original: sems can du ston pa ma yin pa'i phyi'i dang ni ldan pa yod pa ma yin no //
analyzed: sems can du ston pa ma yin pa'i phyi'i dang ni ldan pa yod pa ma yin no //
translated: It is not associated with the external elements, because they do not manifest as sentient beings.

original: dbang po dang tha mi dad pa'i sgo'i khams ni thams cad na yod pa'i phyir ro //üîΩyang na ni de'i phyogs gcig na yod pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhes rgol par byed do //
analyzed: dbang po dang tha mi dad pa'i sgo'i khams ni thams cad na yod pa'i phyir ro // yang na ni de'i phyogs gcig na yod pa'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa'i phyir nyes pa med do zhes rgol par byed do //
translated: The element of the gate that is not distinct from the sense faculty exists in all realms.üîΩOr else, there is no fault, because it is explained from the perspective of one part of that realm.

original: gzhan dag na re zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ste /
translated: Others say:

original: bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa de dag ni /
analyzed: bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs par skyes pa de dag ni /
translated: Those born in the second absorption and above

original: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa phan tshun smra bar byed do //
analyzed: bsam gtan dang po'i sa pa phan tshun smra bar byed do //
translated: converse with each other in the first absorption.

original: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa rnam par rig byed kyi kun slong can yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon du byed de rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bzhin no //
analyzed: ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa rnam par rig byed kyi kun slong can yid kyi rnam par shes pa mngon du byed de rnam par shes pa'i tshogs bzhin no //
translated: They manifest unobscured neutral mental consciousness motivated by indicative form, like the four collections of consciousness.

original: de'i phyir ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no ;
analyzed: de'i phyir ma bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa kho na yin no ;
translated: Therefore it is only unobscured neutral.

original: de lta bu zhes bya ba ni dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can gyi rang bzhin mngon du mi byed pa'i rgyu smras pa dman pa'i phyir dge ba mngon du mi byed la /
analyzed: de lta bu zhes bya ba ni dge ba dang nyon mongs pa can gyi rang bzhin mngon du mi byed pa'i rgyu smras pa dman pa'i phyir dge ba mngon du mi byed la /
translated: Such is the reason for not manifesting virtue and affliction.

original: spangs zin pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can mngon du mi byed do //
analyzed: spangs zin pa'i phyir nyon mongs pa can mngon du mi byed do //
translated: One does not manifest virtue because the cause is inferior, and one does not manifest affliction because it has already been abandoned.

original: snga ma kho na brjod do zhes bya ba ni phyi'i 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas pa'o //
analyzed: snga ma kho na brjod do zhes bya ba ni phyi'i 'byung ba chen po rgyur byas pa'o //
translated: The former is said to be the cause of the external great elements.

original: n'a nanta (bar med par) ri ki tsam k'a ra na ma sa (rgyu mi nus par grags so/) / martha ki la /
analyzed: n'a nanta (bar med par) ri ki tsam k'a ra na ma sa (rgyu mi nus par grags so/) / martha ki la /
translated: The word nƒÅnanda is known to mean ‚Äúwithout cause‚Äù or ‚Äúwithout reason.‚Äù

original: de rnam par rig byed kyi kun slong can sa gzhan du skyes pas lus dang ngag gi las slong bar byed de /
analyzed: de rnam par rig byed kyi kun slong can sa gzhan du skyes pas lus dang ngag gi las slong bar byed de /
translated: One born in another stage who is motivated by indicative form causes the karma of body and speech.

original: 'di yang bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang mar bzhugs pa la gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyis @22b phyag 'tshal ba dang bstod pa dang bkur sti byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'di yang bcom ldan 'das gnas gtsang mar bzhugs pa la gnas gtsang ma pa rnams kyis @22b phyag 'tshal ba dang bstod pa dang bkur sti byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: This is because the Pure Abodes worship, praise, and honor the BhagavƒÅn who resides in the Pure Abodes.

original: gzhan dag na re gnas gtsang ma la sogs par gshegs te dri ba mdzad pa thos pa'i phyir tsam gyi sgo nas so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re gnas gtsang ma la sogs par gshegs te dri ba mdzad pa thos pa'i phyir tsam gyi sgo nas so zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say: He went to the pristine abodes and so on and asked questions there.

original: gang phyir kun slong med ces bya ba la /
analyzed: gang phyir kun slong med ces bya ba la /
translated: Because there is no motivation,

original: rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa dang bsgom pas spang bar bya bas rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed de gang yang rung ba zhig ma tshang bas ni ma yin no //
analyzed: rtog pa dang dpyod pa dang bcas pa dang bsgom pas spang bar bya bas rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar byed de gang yang rung ba zhig ma tshang bas ni ma yin no //
translated: it is said that indicative form is motivated by investigation and analysis and by that which is to be abandoned by the path of meditation, but not by any other.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is that?

original: brtags shing dpyad nas tshig tu smra'i ma brtags ma dpyad par ni ma yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir la /
analyzed: brtags shing dpyad nas tshig tu smra'i ma brtags ma dpyad par ni ma yin no zhes 'byung ba'i phyir la /
translated: Because it is said, ‚ÄúOne speaks words after investigating and analyzing, not without investigating and analyzing.‚Äù

original: mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni kha nang du bltas nas 'jug pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar mi nus so //üîΩbsgom par bya ba ni kha phyir bltas te 'jug pa'i phyir nus na 'dod pa'i phyir na ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba bsgribs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: mthong bas spang bar bya ba ni kha nang du bltas nas 'jug pa'i phyir rnam par rig byed kun nas slong bar mi nus so //üîΩbsgom par bya ba ni kha phyir bltas te 'jug pa'i phyir nus na 'dod pa'i phyir na ni bsgom pas spang bar bya ba bsgribs pa ma yin te /
translated: And because that which is to be abandoned by the path of seeing is unable to motivate indicative form since it engages its object by turning inward.üîΩThat which is to be abandoned by the path of meditation is able to motivate indicative form since it engages its object by turning outward.

original: 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba las ma gtogs pa'i bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa gzhan med pa'i phyir la /
analyzed: 'jig tshogs dang mthar 'dzin par lta ba las ma gtogs pa'i bsgribs la lung du ma bstan pa gzhan med pa'i phyir la /
translated: because there is no other obscured neutral state except for the afflicted view of the self and extreme view,

original: de gnyis kyang mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de gnyis kyang mthong bas spang bar bya ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because those two are objects abandoned by the path of seeing.

original: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gong na rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag yod pa yang ma yin te /
analyzed: tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi gong na rtog pa dang dpyod pa dag yod pa yang ma yin te /
translated: Also, investigation and analysis do not exist above the Brahma realm.

original: de'i phyir gang yang rung ba dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na rnam par rig byed med la /
analyzed: de'i phyir gang yang rung ba dang bral ba'i phyir bsam gtan gnyis pa la sogs pa dag na rnam par rig byed med la /
translated: Therefore, because they are free of either investigation or analysis, indicative form does not exist in the second absorption and so on.

original: 'dod pa'i khams na bsgribs pa yang med do //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams na bsgribs pa yang med do //
translated: Also, obscured neutral states do not exist in the desire realm.

original: 'dod pa'i khams na kun nas slong ba med pas bsgribs pa med do zhes bya bas rnam par dpyod pa skyes pas 'dri ba ni yang ci kun nas slong ba'i dbang kho nas chos rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'o //
analyzed: 'dod pa'i khams na kun nas slong ba med pas bsgribs pa med do zhes bya bas rnam par dpyod pa skyes pas 'dri ba ni yang ci kun nas slong ba'i dbang kho nas chos rnams kyi zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung ba'o //
translated: The question arises: ‚ÄúDo phenomena that are not neutral states exist in the desire realm?‚Äù

original: thar pa dam pa'i don du dge zhes bya bas ni don gyi ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun nas slong bas dge ba ni kun rdzob tu yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: thar pa dam pa'i don du dge zhes bya bas ni don gyi ngo bo nyid dang mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun nas slong bas dge ba ni kun rdzob tu yin no zhes bstan par 'gyur ro //
translated: The word ‚Äúgood‚Äù in the sense of ‚Äúhighest liberation‚Äù indicates that the good is conventional, in the sense of being related to the nature of the object and to the motivation.

original: de ni gcig tu shin tu dge ba ma yin te 'du byed dang 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis bde ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni gcig tu shin tu dge ba ma yin te 'du byed dang 'gyur ba'i sdug bsngal dag gis bde ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: It is not absolutely good, because it is not happiness, since it is subject to the suffering of conditioned existence and to the suffering of change.

original: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung bas ni 'dir dge ba'i don ni bde ba'i don yin no zhes ston to //
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba rgyas par 'byung bas ni 'dir dge ba'i don ni bde ba'i don yin no zhes ston to //
translated: The word ‚Äúliberation‚Äù in the above passage indicates that the meaning of ‚Äúgood‚Äù is ‚Äúhappiness.‚Äù

original: de ltar rnam par smin pa bde ba nyid kyis phung khrol thams cad sel ba'i don gyi sa lhag ma rnams @23a * //üîΩdge ba nyid du bdag nyid thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de ltar rnam par smin pa bde ba nyid kyis phung khrol thams cad sel ba'i don gyi sa lhag ma rnams @23a * // dge ba nyid du bdag nyid thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, the remaining stages are good in every way, because they are the cause of the happiness that is the full consequence of evolution.

original: gzhan dag na re dam pa yang yin la don yang yin pas don dam pa'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re dam pa yang yin la don yang yin pas don dam pa'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say that the word ‚Äúparamartha‚Äù is a compound of ‚Äúpara‚Äù and ‚Äúartha,‚Äù and that it means ‚Äúhighest object.‚Äù

original: dam pa zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa ste phul du dbyung du med do snyam du bsams pa'o //
analyzed: dam pa zhes bya ba ni mthar thug pa ste phul du dbyung du med do snyam du bsams pa'o //
translated: The term ‚Äúultimate‚Äù means that which is final, that is, that which cannot be surpassed.

original: don ni rdzas dang dngos po zhes bya ba'i don to //
analyzed: don ni rdzas dang dngos po zhes bya ba'i don to //
translated: The term ‚Äúobject‚Äù means substance and entity.

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: The following is taught:

original: mya ngan las 'das pa na dge ba'i don gyis bogs dbyung du med pa'i rdzas yin la /
analyzed: mya ngan las 'das pa na dge ba'i don gyis bogs dbyung du med pa'i rdzas yin la /
translated: In nirvana, there is a substance that cannot be surpassed in terms of virtue.

original: de ni rtag pa'i phyir dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi mchog yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: de ni rtag pa'i phyir dge ba'i chos thams cad kyi mchog yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: And because it is permanent, it is the supreme of all virtuous entities.

original: gzhan mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun nas slong ba la mi bltos pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: gzhan mtshungs par ldan pa dang kun nas slong ba la mi bltos pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni //
translated: Because it does not depend on something else, that is, on an associated factor or an instigator.

original: rnam par shes pa dang tshor ba la sogs pa ltar gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa la mi bltos pa'i phyir dang lus dang ngag gi las ltar kun nas slong ba la mi bltos pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shes pa dang tshor ba la sogs pa ltar gzhan dang mtshungs par ldan pa la mi bltos pa'i phyir dang lus dang ngag gi las ltar kun nas slong ba la mi bltos pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Unlike consciousness, feeling, etc., it does not depend on an associated factor. Unlike bodily and vocal actions, it does not depend on an instigator.

original: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'di skad bstan par 'gyur te /
translated: The following is taught:

original: gang zhig mtshungs par ldan pa dang / kun nas slong ba'i dbang gis dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i dbye bas tha dad par mi 'gyur ba de ni rang gi ngo bos dge ba dang mi dge ba yin no //
analyzed: gang zhig mtshungs par ldan pa dang / kun nas slong ba'i dbang gis dge ba dang mi dge ba dang lung du ma bstan pa'i dbye bas tha dad par mi 'gyur ba de ni rang gi ngo bos dge ba dang mi dge ba yin no //
translated: That which is not differentiated as wholesome, unwholesome, or undefined by the differentiation of association and motivation is wholesome or unwholesome by its intrinsic nature.

original: 'o na 'gog pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang shes rab dang dad pa dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang btang snyoms rnams kyang 'dir 'dus pa bya na /
analyzed: 'o na 'gog pa dang 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang shes rab dang dad pa dang shin tu sbyangs pa dang btang snyoms rnams kyang 'dir 'dus pa bya na /
translated: If cessation, the attainment of nonperception, wisdom, faith, pliancy, and equanimity are included here,

original: 'di dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba la sogs pa ste /
analyzed: 'di dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba la sogs pa ste /
translated: then they are roots of wholesomeness, etc.

original: nam yang mi dge ba 'am lung ma bstan du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
analyzed: nam yang mi dge ba 'am lung ma bstan du 'gyur ba ma yin no //
translated: They are never unwholesome or undefined.

original: kha cig na re /
analyzed: kha cig na re /
translated: Some say:

original: gang gi phyir gcig mtha' gcig tu nges pa ma bzung bar rtsa ba ngo tsha khrel yod bdag nyid kyis zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir gcig mtha' gcig tu nges pa ma bzung bar rtsa ba ngo tsha khrel yod bdag nyid kyis zhes zer ro //
translated: Because one is not grasped as definitely one way or the other, they are roots of wholesomeness by their intrinsic reality.

original: gzhan dag na re /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re /
translated: Others say:

original: dad pa can rnams la ngo bo nyid kyis dge ba nyid du 'dod pa kho na'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: dad pa can rnams la ngo bo nyid kyis dge ba nyid du 'dod pa kho na'o zhes zer ro //
translated: They are asserted to be wholesome by their intrinsic reality only for those who have faith.

original: de lta ni ma yin te /
analyzed: de lta ni ma yin te /
translated: That is not so,

original: rtsa ba ngo tsha khrel yod bdag nyid kyis zhes bstan pa 'di dang 'gal lo //
analyzed: rtsa ba ngo tsha khrel yod bdag nyid kyis zhes bstan pa 'di dang 'gal lo //
translated: because it contradicts the statement, ‚ÄúIt is by the power of shame and embarrassment that one is called virtuous.‚Äù

original: mi 'gal te dgongs pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi 'gal te dgongs pa can yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: There is no contradiction, because that statement is interpretable in meaning.

original: 'di la dgongs pa gang /
analyzed: 'di la dgongs pa gang /
translated: What is the intention there?

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog pa nyid kyis 'dir dge ba nyid du dgongs pa'o //
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las bzlog pa nyid kyis 'dir dge ba nyid du dgongs pa'o //
translated: The intention is that it is virtuous because it is the opposite of the unwholesome.

original: ma yin te yang re zhig kho nar bdag nyid kyis dge ba zhes so //
analyzed: ma yin te yang re zhig kho nar bdag nyid kyis dge ba zhes so //
translated: But it is not so, because it is said, ‚ÄúIt is by the power of shame and embarrassment that one is called virtuous.‚Äù

original: ji skad du bstan bcos las /
analyzed: ji skad du bstan bcos las /
translated: As the treatise Attainment of Knowledge says,

original: nyes par spyod pa gsum dang legs @23b par spyod pa gsum dang dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum rnams mi lcogs pa med pa la brten nas 'gog par byed do zhes so //
analyzed: nyes par spyod pa gsum dang legs @23b par spyod pa gsum dang dge ba'i rtsa ba gsum rnams mi lcogs pa med pa la brten nas 'gog par byed do zhes so //
translated: ‚ÄúOne stops the three misdeeds, the three good deeds, and the three roots of nonvirtue by relying on the stage of unrestricted access.‚Äù

original: legs par spyod pa yongs su gtugs pa ni ma yin te ma chags pa la sogs pa mi lcogs pa med pas 'gog pa nyid med pas so //
analyzed: legs par spyod pa yongs su gtugs pa ni ma yin te ma chags pa la sogs pa mi lcogs pa med pas 'gog pa nyid med pas so //
translated: But it is not that the good deeds are exhausted, because the roots of nonvirtue are not stopped by the unrestricted access of nonattachment and so on.

original: gal te de lta na mi mthun pa'i phyogs khro ba la sogs pa yang mi dge ba'i rang bzhin du yod na /
analyzed: gal te de lta na mi mthun pa'i phyogs khro ba la sogs pa yang mi dge ba'i rang bzhin du yod na /
translated: If that is so, then anger and so on, which are the opposites of the roots of virtue, would exist as the nature of nonvirtue.

original: ci'i phyir mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa rnams kho na ngo bo nyid kyi mi dge bar bshad ce na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir mi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang ngo tsha med pa dang khrel med pa rnams kho na ngo bo nyid kyi mi dge bar bshad ce na /
translated: Why are only the roots of nonvirtue, shamelessness, and nonembarrassment explained as being intrinsically nonvirtuous?

original: rnam par shas pa thams cad la brten pa yin pa'i phyir dang rnam pa thams cad du spang bar bya ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rnam par shas pa thams cad la brten pa yin pa'i phyir dang rnam pa thams cad du spang bar bya ba nyid du 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are the basis of all consciousnesses and because they are to be abandoned in every way.

original: de ltar byas te khro ba la sogs pa ni ma yin pas gzhan du bshad do //
analyzed: de ltar byas te khro ba la sogs pa ni ma yin pas gzhan du bshad do //
